 2119: 
 2120: %% Tests that ?FILE_MODULE:sync/1 at least doesn't crash.
 2121: sync(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2122:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2123:     Sync = filename:join(PrivDir,
 2124: 			 atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 2125: 			 ++"_sync.fil"),
 2126: 
 2127:     %% Raw open.
 2128:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Sync, [write, raw]),
 2129:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:sync(Fd),
 2130:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2131: 
 2132:     %% Ordinary open.
 2133:     {ok, Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Sync, [write]),
 2134:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:sync(Fd2),
 2135:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 2136: 
 2137:     [] = flush(),
 2138:     ok.
 2139: 
 2140: %% Tests that ?FILE_MODULE:advise/4 at least doesn't crash.
 2141: advise(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2142:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2143:     Advise = filename:join(PrivDir,
 2144: 			   atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 2145: 			   ++"_advise.fil"),
 2146: 
 2147:     Line1 = "Hello\n",
 2148:     Line2 = "World!\n",
 2149: 
 2150:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [write]),
 2151:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:advise(Fd, 0, 0, normal),
 2152:     ok = io:format(Fd, "~s", [Line1]),
 2153:     ok = io:format(Fd, "~s", [Line2]),
 2154:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2155: 
 2156:     {ok, Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [write]),
 2157:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:advise(Fd2, 0, 0, random),
 2158:     ok = io:format(Fd2, "~s", [Line1]),
 2159:     ok = io:format(Fd2, "~s", [Line2]),
 2160:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 2161: 
 2162:     {ok, Fd3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [write]),
 2163:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:advise(Fd3, 0, 0, sequential),
 2164:     ok = io:format(Fd3, "~s", [Line1]),
 2165:     ok = io:format(Fd3, "~s", [Line2]),
 2166:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd3),
 2167: 
 2168:     {ok, Fd4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [write]),
 2169:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:advise(Fd4, 0, 0, will_need),
 2170:     ok = io:format(Fd4, "~s", [Line1]),
 2171:     ok = io:format(Fd4, "~s", [Line2]),
 2172:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd4),
 2173: 
 2174:     {ok, Fd5} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [write]),
 2175:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:advise(Fd5, 0, 0, dont_need),
 2176:     ok = io:format(Fd5, "~s", [Line1]),
 2177:     ok = io:format(Fd5, "~s", [Line2]),
 2178:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd5),
 2179: 
 2180:     {ok, Fd6} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [write]),
 2181:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:advise(Fd6, 0, 0, no_reuse),
 2182:     ok = io:format(Fd6, "~s", [Line1]),
 2183:     ok = io:format(Fd6, "~s", [Line2]),
 2184:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd6),
 2185: 
 2186:     {ok, Fd7} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [write]),
 2187:     {error, einval} = ?FILE_MODULE:advise(Fd7, 0, 0, bad_advise),
 2188:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd7),
 2189: 
 2190:     %% test write without advise, then a read after an advise
 2191:     {ok, Fd8} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [write]),
 2192:     ok = io:format(Fd8, "~s", [Line1]),
 2193:     ok = io:format(Fd8, "~s", [Line2]),
 2194:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd8),
 2195:     {ok, Fd9} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Advise, [read]),
 2196:     Offset = 0,
 2197:     %% same as a 0 length in some implementations
 2198:     Length = length(Line1) + length(Line2),
 2199:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:advise(Fd9, Offset, Length, sequential),
 2200:     {ok, Line1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_line(Fd9),
 2201:     {ok, Line2} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_line(Fd9),
 2202:     eof = ?FILE_MODULE:read_line(Fd9),
 2203:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd9),
 2204: 
 2205:     [] = flush(),
 2206:     ok.
 2207: 
 2208: %% Tests that ?FILE_MODULE:allocate/3 at least doesn't crash.
 2209: allocate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2210:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2211:     Allocate = filename:join(PrivDir,
 2212: 			     atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 2213: 			     ++"_allocate.fil"),
 2214: 
 2215:     Line1 = "Hello\n",
 2216:     Line2 = "World!\n",
 2217: 
 2218:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Allocate, [write, binary]),
 2219:     allocate_and_assert(Fd, 1, iolist_size([Line1, Line2])),
 2220:     ok = io:format(Fd, "~s", [Line1]),
 2221:     ok = io:format(Fd, "~s", [Line2]),
 2222:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2223: 
 2224:     {ok, Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Allocate, [write, binary]),
 2225:     allocate_and_assert(Fd2, 1, iolist_size(Line1)),
 2226:     ok = io:format(Fd2, "~s", [Line1]),
 2227:     ok = io:format(Fd2, "~s", [Line2]),
 2228:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 2229: 
 2230:     {ok, Fd3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Allocate, [write, binary]),
 2231:     allocate_and_assert(Fd3, 1, iolist_size(Line1) + 1),
 2232:     ok = io:format(Fd3, "~s", [Line1]),
 2233:     ok = io:format(Fd3, "~s", [Line2]),
 2234:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd3),
 2235: 
 2236:     {ok, Fd4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Allocate, [write, binary]),
 2237:     allocate_and_assert(Fd4, 1, 4 * iolist_size([Line1, Line2])),
 2238:     ok = io:format(Fd4, "~s", [Line1]),
 2239:     ok = io:format(Fd4, "~s", [Line2]),
 2240:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd4),
 2241: 
 2242:     [] = flush(),
 2243:     ok.
 2244: 
 2245: allocate_and_assert(Fd, Offset, Length) ->
 2246:     %% Just verify that calls to ?PRIM_FILE:allocate/3 don't crash or have
 2247:     %% any other negative side effect. We can't really assert against a
 2248:     %% specific return value, because support for file space pre-allocation
 2249:     %% depends on the OS, OS version and underlying filesystem.
 2250:     %%
 2251:     %% The Linux kernel added support for fallocate() in version 2.6.23,
 2252:     %% which currently works only for the ext4, ocfs2, xfs and btrfs file
 2253:     %% systems. posix_fallocate() is available in glibc as of version
 2254:     %% 2.1.94, but it was buggy until glibc version 2.7.
 2255:     %%
 2256:     %% Mac OS X, as of version 10.3, supports the fcntl operation F_PREALLOCATE.
 2257:     %%
 2258:     %% Solaris supports posix_fallocate() but only for the UFS file system
 2259:     %% apparently (not supported for ZFS).
 2260:     %%
 2261:     %% FreeBSD 9.0 is the first FreeBSD release supporting posix_fallocate().
 2262:     %%
 2263:     %% For Windows there's apparently no way to pre-allocate file space, at
 2264:     %% least with same semantics as posix_fallocate(), fallocate() and
 2265:     %% fcntl F_PREALLOCATE.
 2266:     Result = ?FILE_MODULE:allocate(Fd, Offset, Length),
 2267:     case os:type() of
 2268:         {win32, _} ->
 2269:             {error, enotsup} = Result;
 2270:         _ ->
 2271:             _ = Result
 2272:     end.
 2273: 
 2274: %% Tests that asserts that file:allocate/3 changes file size
 2275: allocate_file_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2276:     case os:type() of
 2277:         {unix, darwin} ->
 2278:             do_allocate_file_size(Config);
 2279:         {unix, linux} ->
 2280:             do_allocate_file_size(Config);
 2281:         {win32, _} ->
 2282:             {skip, "Windows does not support file:allocate/3"};
 2283:         _ ->
 2284:             {skip, "Support for allocate/3 is spotty in our test platform at the moment."}
 2285:     end.
 2286: 
 2287: do_allocate_file_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2288:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2289:     Allocate = filename:join(PrivDir, atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_allocate_file"),
 2290: 
 2291:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Allocate, [write]),
 2292:     Result =
 2293:         case ?FILE_MODULE:allocate(Fd, 0, 1024) of
 2294:             ok ->
 2295:                 {ok, 1024} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, eof),
 2296:                 ok;
 2297:             {error, enotsup} ->
 2298:                 {skip, "Filesystem does not support file:allocate/3"}
 2299:           end,
 2300:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2301: 
 2302:     [] = flush(),
 2303:     Result.
 2304: 
 2305: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2306: 
 2307: delete(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2308:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 2309:     Name = filename:join(RootDir,
 2310: 			 atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 2311: 			 ++"_delete.fil"),
 2312:     {ok, Fd1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, write),
 2313:     io:format(Fd1,"ok.\n",[]),
 2314:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd1),
 2315:     %% Check that the file is readable
 2316:     {ok, Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, read),
 2317:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 2318:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Name),
 2319:     %% Check that the file is not readable anymore
 2320:     {error, _} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, read),
 2321:     %% Try deleting a nonexistent file
 2322:     {error, enoent} = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Name),
 2323:     Name2 = filename:join(RootDir,
 2324:                           atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 2325:                           ++"_delete_2.fil"),
 2326:     {ok, Fd3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2, write),
 2327:     io:format(Fd3,"ok.\n",[]),
 2328:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd3),
 2329:     %% Check that the file is readable
 2330:     {ok, Fd4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2, read),
 2331:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd4),
 2332:     %% Try deleting with the raw option
 2333:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Name2, [raw]),
 2334:     %% Check that the file is not readable anymore
 2335:     {error, _} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2, read),
 2336:     %% Try deleting a nonexistent file with the raw option
 2337:     {error, enoent} = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Name2, [raw]),
 2338:     [] = flush(),
 2339:     ok.
 2340: 
 2341: rename(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2342:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 2343:     FileName1 = atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_rename.fil",
 2344:     FileName2 = atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_rename.ful",
 2345:     Name1 = filename:join(RootDir, FileName1),
 2346:     Name2 = filename:join(RootDir, FileName2),
 2347:     {ok,Fd1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name1,write),
 2348:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd1),
 2349:     %% Rename, and check that id really changed name
 2350:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(Name1,Name2),
 2351:     {error, _} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name1,read),
 2352:     {ok,Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2,read),
 2353:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 2354:     %% Try renaming something to itself
 2355:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(Name2,Name2),
 2356:     %% Try renaming something that doesn't exist
 2357:     {error, enoent} = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(Name1,Name2),
 2358:     %% Try renaming to something else than a string
 2359:     {error, badarg} = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(Name1,{foo,bar}),
 2360: 
 2361:     %% Move between directories
 2362:     DirName1 = filename:join(RootDir,
 2363: 			     atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 2364: 			     ++"_rename_dir"),
 2365:     DirName2 = filename:join(RootDir,
 2366: 			     atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 2367: 			     ++"_second_rename_dir"),
 2368:     Name1foo = filename:join(DirName1, "foo.fil"),
 2369:     Name2foo = filename:join(DirName2, "foo.fil"),
 2370:     Name2bar = filename:join(DirName2, "bar.dir"),
 2371:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(DirName1),
 2372:     %% The name has to include the full file name, path in not enough
 2373:     expect({error, eisdir}, {error, eexist},
 2374: 	   ?FILE_MODULE:rename(Name2,DirName1)),
 2375:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(Name2, Name1foo),
 2376:     %% Now rename the directory
 2377:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(DirName1,DirName2),
 2378:     %% And check that the file is there now
 2379:     {ok,Fd3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2foo, read),
 2380:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd3),
 2381:     %% Try some dirty things now: move the directory into itself
 2382:     {error, Msg1} = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(DirName2, Name2bar),
 2383:     io:format("Errmsg1: ~p",[Msg1]),
 2384:     %% move dir into a file in itself
 2385:     {error, Msg2} = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(DirName2, Name2foo),
 2386:     io:format("Errmsg2: ~p",[Msg2]),
 2387: 
 2388:     [] = flush(),
 2389:     ok.
 2390: 
 2391: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2392: 
 2393: names(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2394:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 2395:     FileName = "foo1.fil",
 2396:     Name1 = filename:join(RootDir, FileName),
 2397:     Name2 = [RootDir,"/","foo1",".","fil"],
 2398:     Name3 = [RootDir,"/",foo,$1,[[[],[],'.']],"f",il],
 2399:     {ok,Fd0} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name1,write),
 2400:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd0),
 2401: 
 2402:     %% Try some file names
 2403:     {ok,Fd1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name1,read),
 2404:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd1),
 2405:     {ok,Fd2f} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(lists:flatten(Name2),read),
 2406:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2f),
 2407:     {ok,Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2,read),
 2408:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 2409:     {ok,Fd3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name3,read),
 2410:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd3),
 2411: 
 2412:     %% Now try the same on raw files.
 2413:     {ok,Fd4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2, [read, raw]),
 2414:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd4),
 2415:     {ok,Fd4f} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(lists:flatten(Name2), [read, raw]),
 2416:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd4f),
 2417:     {ok,Fd5} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name3, [read, raw]),
 2418:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd5),
 2419: 
 2420:     case length(Name1) > 255 of
 2421: 	true ->
 2422: 	    io:format("Path too long for an atom:\n\n~p\n", [Name1]);
 2423: 	false ->
 2424: 	    Name4 = list_to_atom(Name1),
 2425: 	    {ok,Fd6} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name4,read),
 2426: 	    ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd6)
 2427:     end,
 2428: 
 2429:     %% Try some path names
 2430:     Path1 = RootDir,
 2431:     Path2 = [RootDir],
 2432:     Path3 = ['',[],[RootDir,[[]]]],
 2433:     {ok,Fd11,_} = ?FILE_MODULE:path_open([Path1],FileName,read),
 2434:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd11),
 2435:     {ok,Fd12,_} = ?FILE_MODULE:path_open([Path2],FileName,read),
 2436:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd12),
 2437:     {ok,Fd13,_} = ?FILE_MODULE:path_open([Path3],FileName,read),
 2438:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd13),
 2439:     case length(Path1) > 255 of
 2440: 	true->
 2441: 	    io:format("Path too long for an atom:\n\n~p\n", [Path1]);
 2442: 	false ->
 2443: 	    Path4 = list_to_atom(Path1),
 2444: 	    {ok,Fd14,_} = ?FILE_MODULE:path_open([Path4],FileName,read),
 2445: 	    ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd14)
 2446:     end,
 2447:     [] = flush(),
 2448:     ok.
 2449: 
 2450: volume_relative_paths(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2451:     case os:type() of
 2452:         {win32, _} ->
 2453:             {ok, [Drive, $: | _]} = file:get_cwd(),
 2454:             %% Relative to current device root.
 2455:             {ok, RootInfo} = file:read_file_info([Drive, $:, $/]),
 2456:             {ok, RootInfo} = file:read_file_info("/"),
 2457:             %% Relative to current device directory.
 2458:             {ok, DirContents} = file:list_dir([Drive, $:]),
 2459:             {ok, DirContents} = file:list_dir("."),
 2460:             [] = flush(),
 2461:             ok;
 2462:         _ ->
 2463:             {skip, "This test is Windows-specific."}
 2464:     end.
 2465: 
 2466: unc_paths(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2467:     case os:type() of
 2468:         {win32, _} ->
 2469:             %% We assume administrative shares are set up and reachable, and we
 2470:             %% settle for testing presence as some of the returned data is
 2471:             %% different.
 2472:             {ok, _} = file:read_file_info("C:\\Windows\\explorer.exe"),
 2473:             {ok, _} = file:read_file_info("\\\\localhost\\c$\\Windows\\explorer.exe"),
 2474: 
 2475:             {ok, Files} = file:list_dir("C:\\Windows\\"),
 2476:             {ok, Files} = file:list_dir("\\\\localhost\\c$\\Windows\\"),
 2477: 
 2478:             {ok, Cwd} = file:get_cwd(),
 2479: 
 2480:             try
 2481:                 ok = file:set_cwd("\\\\localhost\\c$\\Windows\\"),
 2482:                 {ok, _} = file:read_file_info("explorer.exe")
 2483:             after
 2484:                 file:set_cwd(Cwd)
 2485:             end,
 2486: 
 2487:             [] = flush(),
 2488:             ok;
 2489:         _ ->
 2490:             {skip, "This test is Windows-specific."}
 2491:     end.
 2492: 
 2493: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2494: 
 2495: 
 2496: e_delete(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2497:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2498:     Base = filename:join(RootDir,
 2499: 			 atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_e_delete"),
 2500:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(Base),
 2501: 
 2502:     %% Delete a non-existing file.
 2503:     {error, enoent} =
 2504: 	?FILE_MODULE:delete(filename:join(Base, "non_existing")),
 2505: 
 2506:     %% Delete a directory.
 2507:     {error, eperm} = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Base),
 2508: 
 2509:     %% Use a path-name with a non-directory component.
 2510:     Afile = filename:join(Base, "a_file"),
 2511:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(Afile, "hello\n"),
 2512:     {error, E} =
 2513: 	expect({error, enotdir}, {error, enoent}, 
 2514: 	       ?FILE_MODULE:delete(filename:join(Afile, "another_file"))),
 2515:     io:format("Result: ~p~n", [E]),
 2516: 
 2517:     %% No permission.
 2518:     case os:type() of
 2519: 	{win32, _} ->
 2520: 	    %% Remove a character device.
 2521: 	    expect({error, eacces}, {error, einval},
 2522:                    ?FILE_MODULE:delete("nul"));
 2523: 	_ ->
 2524: 	    ?FILE_MODULE:write_file_info(
 2525: 	       Base, #file_info {mode=0}),
 2526: 	    {error, eacces} = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Afile),
 2527: 	    ?FILE_MODULE:write_file_info(
 2528: 	       Base, #file_info {mode=8#700})
 2529:     end,
 2530: 
 2531:     [] = flush(),
 2532:     ok.
 2533: 
 2534: %%% FreeBSD gives EEXIST when renaming a file to an empty dir, although the
 2535: %%% manual page can be interpreted as saying that EISDIR should be given.
 2536: %%% (What about FreeBSD? We store our nightly build results on a FreeBSD
 2537: %%% file system, that's what.)
 2538: 
 2539: e_rename(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2540:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2541:     Base = filename:join(RootDir,
 2542: 			 atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_e_rename"),
 2543:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(Base),
 2544: 
 2545:     %% Create an empty directory.
 2546:     EmptyDir = filename:join(Base, "empty_dir"),
 2547:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(EmptyDir),
 2548: 
 2549:     %% Create a non-empty directory.
 2550:     NonEmptyDir = filename:join(Base, "non_empty_dir"),
 2551:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(NonEmptyDir),
 2552:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(
 2553: 	    filename:join(NonEmptyDir, "a_file"),
 2554: 	    "hello\n"),
 2555: 
 2556:     %% Create another non-empty directory.
 2557:     ADirectory = filename:join(Base, "a_directory"),
 2558:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(ADirectory),
 2559:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(
 2560: 	    filename:join(ADirectory, "a_file"),
 2561: 	    "howdy\n\n"),
 2562: 
 2563:     %% Create a data file.
 2564:     File = filename:join(Base, "just_a_file"),
 2565:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(File, "anything goes\n\n"),
 2566: 
 2567:     %% Move an existing directory to a non-empty directory.
 2568:     {error, eexist} = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(ADirectory, NonEmptyDir),
 2569: 
 2570:     %% Move a root directory.
 2571:     {error, einval} = ?FILE_MODULE:rename("/", "arne"),
 2572: 
 2573:     %% Move Base into Base/new_name.
 2574:     {error, einval} = 
 2575: 	?FILE_MODULE:rename(Base, filename:join(Base, "new_name")),
 2576: 
 2577:     %% Overwrite a directory with a file.
 2578:     expect({error, eexist}, %FreeBSD (?)
 2579: 	   {error, eisdir},
 2580: 	   ?FILE_MODULE:rename(File, EmptyDir)),
 2581:     expect({error, eexist}, %FreeBSD (?)
 2582: 	   {error, eisdir},
 2583: 	   ?FILE_MODULE:rename(File, NonEmptyDir)),
 2584: 
 2585:     %% Move a non-existing file.
 2586:     NonExistingFile = filename:join(Base, "non_existing_file"),
 2587:     {error, enoent} = ?FILE_MODULE:rename(NonExistingFile, NonEmptyDir),
 2588: 
 2589:     %% Overwrite a file with a directory.
 2590:     expect({error, eexist}, %FreeBSD (?)
 2591: 	   {error, enotdir},
 2592: 	   ?FILE_MODULE:rename(ADirectory, File)),
 2593: 
 2594:     %% Move a file to another filesystem.
 2595:     %% XXX - This test case is bogus. We cannot be guaranteed that
 2596:     %%       the source and destination are on 
 2597:     %%       different filesystems.
 2598:     %%
 2599:     %% XXX - Gross hack!
 2600:     Comment = case os:type() of
 2601: 		  {unix, _} ->
 2602: 		      OtherFs = "/tmp",
 2603: 		      NameOnOtherFs = filename:join(OtherFs, filename:basename(File)),
 2604: 		      {ok, Com} = case ?FILE_MODULE:rename(File, NameOnOtherFs) of
 2605: 				      {error, exdev} ->
 2606: 					  %% The file could be in
 2607: 					  %% the same filesystem!
 2608: 					  {ok, ok};
 2609: 				      ok ->
 2610: 					  {ok, {comment,
 2611: 						"Moving between filesystems "
 2612: 						"succeeded, files are probably "
 2613: 						"in the same filesystem!"}};
 2614: 				      {error, eperm} ->
 2615: 					  {ok, {comment, "SBS! You don't "
 2616: 						"have the permission to do "
 2617: 						"this test!"}};
 2618: 				      Else ->
 2619: 					  Else
 2620: 				  end,
 2621: 		      Com;
 2622: 		  {win32, _} ->
 2623: 		      %% At least Windows NT can
 2624: 		      %% successfully move a file to
 2625: 		      %% another drive.
 2626: 		      ok
 2627: 	      end,
 2628:     [] = flush(),
 2629:     Comment.
 2630: 
 2631: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2632: 
 2633: e_make_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2634:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2635:     Base = filename:join(RootDir, 
 2636: 			 atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_e_make_dir"),
 2637:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(Base),
 2638: 
 2639:     %% A component of the path does not exist.
 2640:     {error, enoent} = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(filename:join([Base, "a", "b"])),
 2641: 
 2642:     %% Use a path-name with a non-directory component.
 2643:     Afile = filename:join(Base, "a_directory"),
 2644:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(Afile, "hello\n"),
 2645:     case ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(
 2646:             filename:join(Afile, "another_directory")) of
 2647:         {error, enotdir} -> io:format("Result: enotdir");
 2648:         {error, enoent} -> io:format("Result: enoent")
 2649:     end,
 2650: 
 2651:     %% No permission (on Unix only).
 2652:     case os:type() of
 2653: 	{win32, _} ->
 2654: 	    ok;
 2655: 	_ ->
 2656: 	    ?FILE_MODULE:write_file_info(Base, #file_info {mode=0}),
 2657: 	    {error, eacces} = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(filename:join(Base, "xxxx")),
 2658: 	    ?FILE_MODULE:write_file_info(
 2659: 	       Base, #file_info {mode=8#700})
 2660:     end,
 2661:     ok.
 2662: 
 2663: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2664: 
 2665: e_del_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2666:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2667:     Base = test_server:temp_name(filename:join(RootDir, "e_del_dir")),
 2668:     io:format("Base: ~p", [Base]),
 2669:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(Base),
 2670: 
 2671:     %% Delete a non-existent directory.
 2672:     {error, enoent} = 
 2673: 	?FILE_MODULE:del_dir(filename:join(Base, "non_existing")),
 2674: 
 2675:     %% Use a path-name with a non-directory component.
 2676:     Afile = filename:join(Base, "a_directory"),
 2677:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(Afile, "hello\n"),
 2678:     {error, E1} = expect({error, enotdir}, {error, enoent},
 2679: 			 ?FILE_MODULE:del_dir(
 2680: 			    filename:join(Afile, "another_directory"))),
 2681:     io:format("Result: ~p", [E1]),
 2682: 
 2683:     %% Delete a non-empty directory.
 2684:     {error, E2} = expect({error, enotempty}, {error, eexist}, {error, eacces},
 2685: 			 ?FILE_MODULE:del_dir(Base)),
 2686:     io:format("Result: ~p", [E2]),
 2687: 
 2688:     %% Remove the current directory.
 2689:     {error, E3} = expect({error, einval}, 
 2690: 			 {error, eperm}, % Linux and DUX
 2691: 			 {error, eacces},
 2692: 			 {error, ebusy},
 2693: 			 ?FILE_MODULE:del_dir(".")),
 2694:     io:format("Result: ~p", [E3]),
 2695: 
 2696:     %% No permission.
 2697:     case os:type() of
 2698: 	{win32, _} ->
 2699: 	    ok;
 2700: 	_ ->
 2701: 	    ADirectory = filename:join(Base, "no_perm"),
 2702: 	    ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(ADirectory),
 2703: 	    ?FILE_MODULE:write_file_info( Base, #file_info {mode=0}),
 2704: 	    {error, eacces} = ?FILE_MODULE:del_dir(ADirectory),
 2705: 	    ?FILE_MODULE:write_file_info( Base, #file_info {mode=8#700})
 2706:     end,
 2707:     [] = flush(),
 2708:     ok.
 2709: 
 2710: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2711: 
 2712: 
 2713: %% Trying reading and positioning from a compressed file.
 2714: 
 2715: read_compressed_cooked(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2716:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2717:     Real = filename:join(Data, "realmen.html.gz"),
 2718:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Real, [read,compressed]),
 2719:     try_read_file_list(Fd).
 2720: 
 2721: read_compressed_cooked_binary(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2722:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2723:     Real = filename:join(Data, "realmen.html.gz"),
 2724:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Real, [read,compressed,binary]),
 2725:     try_read_file_binary(Fd).
 2726: 
 2727: %% Trying reading and positioning from an uncompressed file,
 2728: %% but with the compressed flag given.
 2729: 
 2730: read_not_really_compressed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2731:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2732:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2733: 
 2734:     %% The file realmen.html might have got CRs added (by WinZip).
 2735:     %% Remove them, or the file positions will not be correct.
 2736: 
 2737:     Real = filename:join(Data, "realmen.html"),
 2738:     RealPriv = filename:join(Priv,
 2739: 			     atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_realmen.html"),
 2740:     {ok, RealDataBin} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_file(Real),
 2741:     RealData = remove_crs(binary_to_list(RealDataBin), []),
 2742:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(RealPriv, RealData),
 2743:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(RealPriv, [read, compressed]),
 2744:     try_read_file_list(Fd).
 2745: 
 2746: remove_crs([$\r|Rest], Result) ->
 2747:     remove_crs(Rest, Result);
 2748: remove_crs([C|Rest], Result) ->
 2749:     remove_crs(Rest, [C|Result]);
 2750: remove_crs([], Result) ->
 2751:     lists:reverse(Result).
 2752: 
 2753: try_read_file_list(Fd) ->
 2754:     %% Seek to the current position (nothing should happen).
 2755: 
 2756:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, 0),
 2757:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, {cur, 0}),
 2758: 
 2759:     %% Read a few lines from a compressed file.
 2760: 
 2761:     ShouldBe = "<TITLE>Real Programmers Don't Use PASCAL</TITLE>\n",
 2762:     ShouldBe = io:get_line(Fd, ''),
 2763: 
 2764:     %% Now seek forward.
 2765: 
 2766:     {ok, 381} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, 381),
 2767:     Back = "Back in the good old days -- the \"Golden Era\" " ++
 2768: 	"of computers, it was\n",
 2769:     Back = io:get_line(Fd, ''),
 2770: 
 2771:     %% Try to search forward relative to the current position.
 2772: 
 2773:     {ok, CurPos} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, {cur, 0}),
 2774:     RealPos = 4273,
 2775:     {ok, RealPos} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, {cur, RealPos-CurPos}),
 2776:     RealProg = "<LI> Real Programmers aren't afraid to use GOTOs.\n",
 2777:     RealProg = io:get_line(Fd, ''),
 2778: 
 2779:     %% Seek backward.
 2780: 
 2781:     AfterTitle = length("<TITLE>"),
 2782:     {ok, AfterTitle} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, AfterTitle),
 2783:     Title = "Real Programmers Don't Use PASCAL</TITLE>\n",
 2784:     Title = io:get_line(Fd, ''),
 2785: 
 2786:     %% Seek past the end of the file.
 2787: 
 2788:     {ok, _} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, 25000),
 2789: 
 2790:     %% Done.
 2791: 
 2792:     ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2793:     [] = flush(),
 2794:     ok.
 2795: 
 2796: try_read_file_binary(Fd) ->
 2797:     %% Seek to the current position (nothing should happen).
 2798: 
 2799:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, 0),
 2800:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, {cur, 0}),
 2801: 
 2802:     %% Read a few lines from a compressed file.
 2803: 
 2804:     ShouldBe = <<"<TITLE>Real Programmers Don't Use PASCAL</TITLE>\n">>,
 2805:     ShouldBe = io:get_line(Fd, ''),
 2806: 
 2807:     %% Now seek forward.
 2808: 
 2809:     {ok, 381} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, 381),
 2810:     Back = <<"Back in the good old days -- the \"Golden Era\" "
 2811: 	     "of computers, it was\n">>,
 2812:     Back = io:get_line(Fd, ''),
 2813: 
 2814:     %% Try to search forward relative to the current position.
 2815: 
 2816:     {ok, CurPos} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, {cur, 0}),
 2817:     RealPos = 4273,
 2818:     {ok, RealPos} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, {cur, RealPos-CurPos}),
 2819:     RealProg = <<"<LI> Real Programmers aren't afraid to use GOTOs.\n">>,
 2820:     RealProg = io:get_line(Fd, ''),
 2821: 
 2822:     %% Seek backward.
 2823: 
 2824:     AfterTitle = length("<TITLE>"),
 2825:     {ok, AfterTitle} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, AfterTitle),
 2826:     Title = <<"Real Programmers Don't Use PASCAL</TITLE>\n">>,
 2827:     Title = io:get_line(Fd, ''),
 2828: 
 2829:     %% Done.
 2830: 
 2831:     ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2832:     [] = flush(),
 2833:     ok.
 2834: 
 2835: read_cooked_tar_problem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2836:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2837:     ProblemFile = filename:join(Data, "cooked_tar_problem.tar.gz"),
 2838:     {ok,Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(ProblemFile, [read,compressed,binary]),
 2839: 
 2840:     {ok,34304} = file:position(Fd, 34304),
 2841:     {ok,Bin} = file:read(Fd, 512),
 2842:     512 = byte_size(Bin),
 2843: 
 2844:     {ok,34304+512+1024} = file:position(Fd, {cur,1024}),
 2845: 
 2846:     ok = file:close(Fd),
 2847: 
 2848:     ok.
 2849: 
 2850: 
 2851: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2852: 
 2853: write_compressed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2854:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2855:     MyFile = filename:join(Priv,
 2856: 			   atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_test.gz"),
 2857: 
 2858:     %% Write a file.
 2859: 
 2860:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(MyFile, [write, compressed]),
 2861:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, 0),
 2862:     Prefix = "hello\n",
 2863:     End = "end\n",
 2864:     ok = io:put_chars(Fd, Prefix),
 2865:     {ok, 143} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd, 143),
 2866:     ok = io:put_chars(Fd, End),
 2867:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2868: 
 2869:     %% Read the file and verify the contents.
 2870: 
 2871:     {ok, Fd1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(MyFile, [read, compressed]),
 2872:     Prefix = io:get_line(Fd1, ''),
 2873:     Second = lists:duplicate(143-length(Prefix), 0) ++ End,
 2874:     Second = io:get_line(Fd1, ''),
 2875:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd1),
 2876: 
 2877:     %% Verify successful compression by uncompressing the file
 2878:     %% using zlib:gunzip/1.
 2879: 
 2880:     {ok,Contents} = file:read_file(MyFile),
 2881:     <<"hello\n",0:137/unit:8,"end\n">> = zlib:gunzip(Contents),
 2882: 
 2883:     %% Ensure that the file is compressed.
 2884: 
 2885:     TotalSize = 143 + length(End),
 2886:     case ?FILE_MODULE:read_file_info(MyFile) of
 2887: 	{ok, #file_info{size=Size}} when Size < TotalSize ->
 2888: 	    ok;
 2889: 	{ok, #file_info{size=Size}} when Size == TotalSize ->
 2890: 	    ct:fail(file_not_compressed)
 2891:     end,
 2892: 
 2893:     %% Write again to ensure that the file is truncated.
 2894: 
 2895:     {ok, Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(MyFile, [write, compressed]),
 2896:     NewString = "aaaaaaaaaaa",
 2897:     ok = io:put_chars(Fd2, NewString),
 2898:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 2899:     {ok, Fd3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(MyFile, [read, compressed]),
 2900:     {ok, NewString} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd3, 1024),
 2901:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd3),
 2902: 
 2903:     %% Done.
 2904: 
 2905:     [] = flush(),
 2906:     ok.
 2907: 
 2908: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2909: 
 2910: catenated_gzips(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2911:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2912:     MyFile = filename:join(Priv, ?MODULE_STRING++"_test.gz"),
 2913: 
 2914:     First = "Hello, all good men going to search parties. ",
 2915:     Second = "Now I really need your help.",
 2916:     All = iolist_to_binary([First|Second]),
 2917:     Cat = [zlib:gzip(First),zlib:gzip(Second)],
 2918: 
 2919:     ok = file:write_file(MyFile, Cat),
 2920: 
 2921:     {ok,Fd} = file:open(MyFile, [read,compressed,binary]),
 2922:     {ok,All} = file:read(Fd, 100000),
 2923:     ok = file:close(Fd),
 2924: 
 2925:     ok.
 2926: 
 2927: 
 2928: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2929: 
 2930: compress_errors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2931:     DataDir =
 2932: 	filename:dirname(
 2933: 	  filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config), "x")),
 2934:     DataDirSlash = DataDir++"/",
 2935:     {error, enoent} = ?FILE_MODULE:open("non_existing__",
 2936: 					[compressed, read]),
 2937:     {error, einval} = ?FILE_MODULE:open("non_existing__",
 2938: 					[compressed, read, write]),
 2939:     {error, einval} = ?FILE_MODULE:open("non_existing__",
 2940: 					[compressed, read, append]),
 2941:     {error, einval} = ?FILE_MODULE:open("non_existing__",
 2942: 					[compressed, write, append]),
 2943:     {error, E1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(DataDir, [compressed, read]),
 2944:     {error, E2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(DataDirSlash, [compressed, read]),
 2945:     {error, E3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(DataDir, [compressed, write]),
 2946:     {error, E4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(DataDirSlash, [compressed, write]),
 2947:     {eisdir,eisdir,eisdir,eisdir} = {E1,E2,E3,E4},
 2948: 
 2949:     %% Read a corrupted .gz file.
 2950: 
 2951:     Corrupted = filename:join(DataDir, "corrupted.gz"),
 2952:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Corrupted, [read, compressed]),
 2953:     {error, eio} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd, 100),
 2954:     ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2955: 
 2956:     [] = flush(),
 2957:     ok.
 2958: 
 2959: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2960: 
 2961: compress_async_crash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2962:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2963:     Path = filename:join(DataDir, "test.gz"),
 2964:     ExpectedData = <<"qwerty">>,
 2965: 
 2966:     _ = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Path),
 2967:     {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Path, [write, binary, compressed]),
 2968:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd, ExpectedData),
 2969:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2970: 
 2971:     %% Test that when using async thread pool, the emulator doesn't crash
 2972:     %% when the efile port driver is stopped while a compressed file operation
 2973:     %% is in progress (being carried by an async thread).
 2974:     ok = compress_async_crash_loop(10000, Path, ExpectedData),
 2975:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Path),
 2976:     ok.
 2977: 
 2978: compress_async_crash_loop(0, _Path, _ExpectedData) ->
 2979:     ok;
 2980: compress_async_crash_loop(N, Path, ExpectedData) ->
 2981:     Parent = self(),
 2982:     {Pid, Ref} = spawn_monitor(
 2983: 		   fun() ->
 2984: 			   {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(
 2985: 					 Path, [read, compressed, raw, binary]),
 2986: 			   Len = byte_size(ExpectedData),
 2987: 			   Parent ! {self(), continue},
 2988: 			   {ok, ExpectedData} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd, Len),
 2989: 			   ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd),
 2990: 			   receive foobar -> ok end
 2991: 		   end),
 2992:     receive
 2993:         {Pid, continue} ->
 2994:             exit(Pid, shutdown),
 2995:             receive
 2996:                 {'DOWN', Ref, _, _, Reason} ->
 2997:                     shutdown = Reason
 2998:             end;
 2999:         {'DOWN', Ref, _, _, Reason2} ->
 3000:             ct:fail({worker_exited, Reason2})
 3001:     after 60000 ->
 3002:             exit(Pid, shutdown),
 3003:             erlang:demonitor(Ref, [flush]),
 3004:             ct:fail(worker_timeout)
 3005:     end,
 3006:     compress_async_crash_loop(N - 1, Path, ExpectedData).
 3007: 
 3008: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3009: 
 3010: unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3011:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3012:     Name = filename:join(Dir, "data-utf8.txt"),
 3013:     Txt = lists:seq(128, 255),
 3014:     D = unicode:characters_to_binary(Txt, latin1, latin1),
 3015:     {ok,Fd1} =
 3016: 	?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write,read,binary,{encoding,unicode}]),
 3017:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:truncate(Fd1),
 3018:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd1, Txt),
 3019:     {ok,0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd1, bof),
 3020:     {ok,D} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd1, 129),
 3021:     {ok,0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd1, bof),
 3022:     {ok,D1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd1, 64),
 3023:     {ok,Pos} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd1, cur),
 3024:     {ok,D2} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(Fd1, {cur,0}, 65),
 3025:     D = <<D1/binary, D2/binary>>,
 3026:     {ok,D1} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(Fd1, bof, 64),
 3027:     {ok,Pos} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd1, Pos),
 3028:     {ok,D2} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd1, 64),
 3029:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd1),
 3030:     %%
 3031:     RawD = unicode:characters_to_binary(Txt, latin1, unicode),
 3032:     {ok,RawD} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_file(Name),
 3033:     %%
 3034:     {ok,Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [read,{encoding,unicode}]),
 3035:     {ok,Txt} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd2, 129),
 3036:     {Txt1,Txt2} = lists:split(64, Txt),
 3037:     {ok,Txt2} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(Fd2, Pos, 65),
 3038:     {ok,0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd2, bof),
 3039:     {ok,Txt1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd2, 64),
 3040:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2).
 3041:

 3044: %% Test the file:altname/1 function.
 3045: altname(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3046:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3047:     NewDir = filename:join(RootDir,
 3048: 			   "long alternative path name with spaces"),
 3049:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(NewDir),
 3050:     Name = filename:join(NewDir, "a_file_with_long_name"),
 3051:     ShortName = filename:join(NewDir, "short"),
 3052:     NonexName = filename:join(NewDir, "nonexistent"),
 3053:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(Name, "some contents\n"),
 3054:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(ShortName, "some contents\n"),
 3055:     Result =
 3056: 	case ?FILE_MODULE:altname(NewDir) of
 3057: 	    {error, enotsup} ->
 3058: 		{skipped, "Altname not supported on this platform"};
 3059: 	    {ok, "LONGAL~1"} -> 
 3060: 		{ok, "A_FILE~1"} = ?FILE_MODULE:altname(Name),
 3061: 		{ok, "c:/"} = ?FILE_MODULE:altname("C:/"),
 3062: 		{ok, "c:/"} = ?FILE_MODULE:altname("C:\\"),
 3063: 		{error,enoent} = ?FILE_MODULE:altname(NonexName),
 3064: 		{ok, "short"} = ?FILE_MODULE:altname(ShortName),
 3065: 		ok
 3066: 	end,
 3067:     [] = flush(),
 3068:     Result.
 3069: 
 3070: 
 3071: %% Test creating a hard link.
 3072: make_link(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3073:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3074:     NewDir = filename:join(RootDir,
 3075: 			   atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 3076: 			   ++"_make_link"),
 3077:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(NewDir),
 3078: 
 3079:     Name = filename:join(NewDir, "a_file"),
 3080:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(Name, "some contents\n"),
 3081: 
 3082:     Alias = filename:join(NewDir, "an_alias"),
 3083:     Result =
 3084: 	case ?FILE_MODULE:make_link(Name, Alias) of
 3085: 	    {error, enotsup} ->
 3086: 		{skipped, "Links not supported on this platform"};
 3087: 	    ok ->
 3088: 		%% Note: We take the opportunity to test 
 3089: 		%% ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info/1,
 3090: 		%% which should in behave exactly as 
 3091: 		%% ?FILE_MODULE:read_file_info/1
 3092: 		%% since they are not used on symbolic links.
 3093: 
 3094: 		{ok, Info} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(Name),
 3095:                 {ok,Info} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(Name, [raw]),
 3096: 		{ok, Info} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(Alias),
 3097:                 {ok,Info} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(Alias, [raw]),
 3098: 		#file_info{links = 2, type = regular} = Info,
 3099: 		{error, eexist} =
 3100: 		    ?FILE_MODULE:make_link(Name, Alias),
 3101: 		ok
 3102: 	end,
 3103: 
 3104:     [] = flush(),
 3105:     Result.
 3106: 
 3107: %% Test that reading link info for an ordinary file or directory works
 3108: %% (on all platforms).
 3109: read_link_info_for_non_link(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3110:     {ok, #file_info{type=directory}} =
 3111: 	?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info("."),
 3112:     {ok, #file_info{type=directory}} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(".", [raw]),
 3113: 
 3114:     [] = flush(),
 3115:     ok.
 3116: 
 3117: %% Test operations on symbolic links (for Unix).
 3118: symlinks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3119:     {error, _} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link(lists:duplicate(10000,$a)),
 3120:     {error, _} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_all(lists:duplicate(10000,$a)),
 3121:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3122:     NewDir = filename:join(RootDir,
 3123: 			   atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 3124: 			   ++"_symlinks"),
 3125:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:make_dir(NewDir),
 3126: 
 3127:     Name = filename:join(NewDir, "a_plain_file"),
 3128:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write_file(Name, "some stupid content\n"),
 3129: 
 3130:     Alias = filename:join(NewDir, "a_symlink_alias"),
 3131:     Result =
 3132: 	case ?FILE_MODULE:make_symlink(Name, Alias) of
 3133: 	    {error, enotsup} ->
 3134: 		{skipped, "Links not supported on this platform"};
 3135: 	    {error, eperm} ->
 3136: 		{win32,_} = os:type(),
 3137: 		{skipped, "Windows user not privileged to create symlinks"};
 3138: 	    ok ->
 3139: 		{ok, Info1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_file_info(Name),
 3140:                 {ok,Info1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_file_info(Name, [raw]),
 3141: 		{ok, Info1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_file_info(Alias),
 3142:                 {ok,Info1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_file_info(Alias, [raw]),
 3143: 		{ok, Info1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(Name),
 3144:                 {ok,Info1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(Name, [raw]),
 3145: 		#file_info{links = 1, type = regular} = Info1,
 3146: 
 3147: 		{ok, Info2} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(Alias),
 3148:                 {ok,Info2} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_info(Alias, [raw]),
 3149: 		#file_info{links=1, type=symlink} = Info2,
 3150: 		{ok, Name} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link(Alias),
 3151: 		{ok, Name} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_link_all(Alias),
 3152: 		%% If all is good, delete dir again (avoid hanging dir on windows)
 3153: 		file:del_dir_r(NewDir),
 3154: 		ok
 3155: 	end,
 3156: 
 3157:     [] = flush(),
 3158:     Result.
 3159:

 3161: 
 3162: copy(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3163:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3164:     %% Create a text file.
 3165:     Name1 = filename:join(RootDir, atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_copy_1.txt"),
 3166:     Line = "The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog. 0123456789\n",
 3167:     Len = length(Line),
 3168:     {ok, Handle1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name1, [write]),
 3169:     {_, Size1} =
 3170: 	iterate({0, 0},
 3171: 		done,
 3172: 		fun({_, S}) when S >= 128*1024 ->
 3173: 			done;
 3174: 		   ({N, S}) ->
 3175: 			H = integer_to_list(N),
 3176: 			ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Handle1, [H, " ", Line]),
 3177: 			{N + 1, S + length(H) + 1 + Len}
 3178: 		end),
 3179:     ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle1),
 3180:     %% Make a copy
 3181:     Name2 = filename:join(RootDir, atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_copy_2.txt"),
 3182:     {ok, Size1} = ?FILE_MODULE:copy(Name1, Name2),
 3183:     %% Concatenate 1
 3184:     Name3 = filename:join(RootDir, atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_copy_3.txt"),
 3185:     {ok, Handle3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name3, [raw, write, binary]),
 3186:     {ok, Size1} = ?FILE_MODULE:copy(Name1, Handle3),
 3187:     {ok, Handle2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2, [read, binary]),
 3188:     {ok, Size1} = ?FILE_MODULE:copy(Handle2, Handle3),
 3189:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle3),
 3190:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle2),
 3191:     %% Concatenate 2
 3192:     Name4 = filename:join(RootDir, atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_copy_4.txt"),
 3193:     {ok, Handle4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name4, [write, binary]),
 3194:     {ok, Size1} = ?FILE_MODULE:copy(Name1, Handle4),
 3195:     {ok, Handle5} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2, [raw, read, binary]),
 3196:     {ok, Size1} = ?FILE_MODULE:copy(Handle5, Handle4),
 3197:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle5),
 3198:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle4),
 3199:     %% %% Just for test of the test
 3200:     %% {ok, Handle2q} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2, [write, append]),
 3201:     %% ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Handle2q, "q"),
 3202:     %% ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle2q),
 3203:     %% Compare the files
 3204:     {ok, Handle1a} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name1, [raw, read]),
 3205:     {ok, Handle2a} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name2, [raw, read]),
 3206:     true = stream_cmp(fd_stream_factory([Handle1a]),
 3207: 		      fd_stream_factory([Handle2a])),
 3208:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Handle1a, 0),
 3209:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Handle2a, 0),
 3210:     {ok, Handle3a} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name3, [raw, read]),
 3211:     true = stream_cmp(fd_stream_factory([Handle1a, Handle2a]),
 3212: 		      fd_stream_factory([Handle2a])),
 3213:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle1a),
 3214:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle2a),
 3215:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Handle3a),
 3216:     [] = flush(),
 3217:     ok.
 3218: 
 3219: 
 3220: 
 3221: fd_stream_factory([]) ->
 3222:     [];
 3223: fd_stream_factory([Fd | T] = L) ->
 3224:     fun() ->
 3225: 	    case ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd, 8192) of
 3226: 		{ok, Data} when is_binary(Data) ->
 3227: 		    binary_to_list(Data) ++ fd_stream_factory(L);
 3228: 		{ok, Data} when is_list(Data) ->
 3229: 		    Data ++ fd_stream_factory(L);
 3230: 		eof ->
 3231: 		    fd_stream_factory(T);
 3232: 		{error, _} = Error ->
 3233: 		    Error
 3234: 	    end
 3235:     end.
 3236: 
 3237: 
 3238: 
 3239: stream_cmp(F1, F2) when is_function(F1), is_function(F2) ->
 3240:     stream_cmp(F1(), F2());
 3241: stream_cmp(F, X) when is_function(F) ->
 3242:     stream_cmp(F(), X);
 3243: stream_cmp(X, F) when is_function(F) ->
 3244:     stream_cmp(X, F());
 3245: stream_cmp({error, _} = Error, _) ->
 3246:     Error;
 3247: stream_cmp(_, {error, _} = Error) ->
 3248:     Error;
 3249: stream_cmp([], []) ->
 3250:     true;
 3251: stream_cmp([], [_|_]) ->
 3252:     false;
 3253: stream_cmp([_|_], []) ->
 3254:     false;
 3255: stream_cmp([H | T1], [H | T2]) ->
 3256:     stream_cmp(T1, T2).
 3257: 
 3258: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3259: 
 3260: %% Test the get_cwd(), open(), and copy() file server calls.
 3261: new_slave(_RootDir, Cwd) ->
 3262:     L = "qwertyuiopasdfghjklzxcvbnm",
 3263:     N = length(L),
 3264:     {ok, Cwd}         = ?FILE_MODULE:get_cwd(),
 3265:     {error, enotsup}  = ?FILE_MODULE:get_cwd("C:"), % Unix only testcase
 3266:     {ok, FD1}         = ?FILE_MODULE:open("file1.txt", write),
 3267:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD1),
 3268:     {ok, FD2}         = ?FILE_MODULE:open("file1.txt",
 3269: 					  [write, append,
 3270: 					   binary, compressed,
 3271: 					   delayed_write,
 3272: 					   {delayed_write, 0, 0},
 3273: 					   read_ahead,
 3274: 					   {read_ahead, 0}]),
 3275:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD2, L),
 3276:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD2),
 3277:     {ok, N2}          = ?FILE_MODULE:copy("file1.txt", "file2.txt"),
 3278:     io:format("Size ~p, compressed ~p.~n", [N, N2]),
 3279:     {ok, FD3}         = ?FILE_MODULE:open("file2.txt",
 3280: 					  [binary, compressed]),
 3281:     %% The file_io_server will translate the binary into a list
 3282:     {ok, L}           = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD3, N+1),
 3283:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD3),
 3284:     %%
 3285:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:delete("file1.txt"),
 3286:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:delete("file2.txt"),
 3287:     []                = flush(),
 3288:     ok.
 3289: 
 3290: 
 3291: %% Test the get_cwd() and open() file server calls.
 3292: old_slave(_RootDir, Cwd) ->
 3293:     L = "qwertyuiopasdfghjklzxcvbnm",
 3294:     N = length(L),
 3295:     {ok, Cwd}         = ?FILE_MODULE:get_cwd(),
 3296:     {error, enotsup}  = ?FILE_MODULE:get_cwd("C:"), % Unix only testcase
 3297:     {ok, FD1}         = ?FILE_MODULE:open("file1.txt", write),
 3298:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD1),
 3299:     {ok, FD2}         = ?FILE_MODULE:open("file1.txt",
 3300: 					  [write, binary, compressed]),
 3301:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD2, L),
 3302:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD2),
 3303:     {ok, FD3}         = ?FILE_MODULE:open("file1.txt", [write, append]),
 3304:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD3),
 3305:     {ok, FD4}         = ?FILE_MODULE:open("file1.txt",
 3306: 					  [binary, compressed]),
 3307:     %% The file_io_server will translate the binary into a list
 3308:     {ok, L}           = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD4, N+1),
 3309:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD4),
 3310:     %%
 3311:     ok                = ?FILE_MODULE:delete("file1.txt"),
 3312:     []                = flush(),
 3313:     ok.
 3314: 
 3315: run_test(Test, Args) ->
 3316:     case (catch apply(?MODULE, Test, Args)) of
 3317: 	{'EXIT', _} = Exit ->
 3318: 	    {done, Exit, get(test_server_loc)};
 3319: 	Result ->
 3320: 	    {done, Result}
 3321:     end.
 3322: 
 3323: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3324: 
 3325: %% Tests the file open option {delayed_write, Size, Delay}.
 3326: 
 3327: delayed_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3328:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3329:     File = filename:join(RootDir, 
 3330: 			 atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_delayed_write.txt"),
 3331:     Data1 = "asdfghjkl",
 3332:     Data2 = "qwertyuio",
 3333:     Data3 = "zxcvbnm,.",
 3334:     Size = length(Data1),
 3335:     Size = length(Data2),
 3336:     Size = length(Data3),
 3337:     Data1Data1 = Data1++Data1,
 3338:     Data1Data1Data1 = Data1Data1++Data1,
 3339:     Data1Data1Data1Data1 = Data1Data1++Data1Data1,
 3340:     %%
 3341:     %% Test caching and normal close of non-raw file
 3342:     {ok, Fd1} = 
 3343: 	?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [write, {delayed_write, Size+1, 400}]),
 3344:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd1, Data1),
 3345:     %% Wait for a reasonable amount of time to check whether the write was
 3346:     %% practically instantaneous or actually delayed.
 3347:     timer:sleep(100),
 3348:     {ok, Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [read]),
 3349:     eof = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd2, 1),
 3350:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd1, Data1), % Data flush on size
 3351:     timer:sleep(100),
 3352:     {ok, Data1Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(Fd2, bof, 2*Size+1),
 3353:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd1, Data1),
 3354:     timer:sleep(500), % Wait until data flush on timeout
 3355:     {ok, Data1Data1Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(Fd2, bof, 3*Size+1),
 3356:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd1, Data1),
 3357:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd1), % Data flush on close
 3358:     timer:sleep(100),
 3359:     {ok, Data1Data1Data1Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(Fd2, bof, 4*Size+1),
 3360:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 3361:     %%
 3362:     %% Test implicit close through exit by file owning process, 
 3363:     %% raw file, default parameters.
 3364:     Parent = self(),
 3365:     Fun = fun() ->
 3366: 		  Child = self(),
 3367: 		  Test =
 3368: 		      fun () ->
 3369: 			      {ok, Fd} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File,
 3370: 							   [raw, write, delayed_write]),
 3371: 			      ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd, Data1),
 3372: 			      Parent ! {Child, wrote},
 3373: 			      receive
 3374: 				  {Parent, continue, Reason} ->
 3375: 				      {ok, Reason}
 3376: 			      end
 3377: 		      end,
 3378: 		  case (catch Test()) of
 3379: 		      {ok, Reason} -> exit(Reason);
 3380: 		      Unknown ->
 3381: 			  exit({Unknown, get(test_server_loc)})
 3382: 		  end
 3383: 	  end,
 3384:     Child1 = spawn(Fun),
 3385:     Mref1 = erlang:monitor(process, Child1),
 3386:     receive 
 3387:         {Child1, wrote} -> 
 3388:             ok;
 3389:         {'DOWN', Mref1, _, _, _} = Down1a ->
 3390:             ct:fail(Down1a)
 3391:     end,
 3392:     timer:sleep(100), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3393:     {ok, Fd3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [read]),
 3394:     eof = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd3, 1),
 3395:     Child1 ! {Parent, continue, normal},
 3396:     receive 
 3397:         {'DOWN', Mref1, process, Child1, normal} -> 
 3398:             ok;
 3399:         {'DOWN', Mref1, _, _, _} = Down1b ->
 3400:             ct:fail(Down1b)
 3401:     end,
 3402:     timer:sleep(100), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3403:     {ok, Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(Fd3, bof, Size+1),
 3404:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd3),
 3405:     %%
 3406:     %% The same again, but this time with reason 'kill'.
 3407:     Child2 = spawn(Fun),
 3408:     Mref2 = erlang:monitor(process, Child2),
 3409:     receive 
 3410:         {Child2, wrote} -> 
 3411:             ok;
 3412:         {'DOWN', Mref2, _, _, _} = Down2a ->
 3413:             ct:fail(Down2a)
 3414:     end,
 3415:     timer:sleep(100), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3416:     {ok, Fd4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [read]),
 3417:     eof = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd4, 1),
 3418:     Child2 ! {Parent, continue, kill},
 3419:     receive 
 3420:         {'DOWN', Mref2, process, Child2, kill} -> 
 3421:             ok;
 3422:         {'DOWN', Mref2, _, _, _} = Down2b ->
 3423:             ct:fail(Down2b)
 3424:     end,
 3425:     timer:sleep(100), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3426:     eof = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(Fd4, bof, 1),
 3427:     ok  = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd4),
 3428:     %%
 3429:     %% Test if file position works with delayed_write
 3430:     {ok, Fd5} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [raw, read, write, 
 3431: 					 delayed_write]),
 3432:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:truncate(Fd5),
 3433:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd5, [Data1|Data2]),
 3434:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd5, bof),
 3435:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd5, [Data3]),
 3436:     {ok, Data2} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd5, Size+1),
 3437:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd5, bof),
 3438:     Data3Data2 = Data3++Data2,
 3439:     {ok, Data3Data2} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd5, 2*Size+1),
 3440:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd5),
 3441:     %%
 3442:     [] = flush(),
 3443:     ok.
 3444: 
 3445: 
 3446: %% Tests file:pid2name/1.
 3447: pid2name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3448:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3449:     Base = test_server:temp_name(
 3450: 	     filename:join(RootDir, "pid2name_")),
 3451:     Name1 = [Base, '.txt'],
 3452:     Name2 = Base ++ ".txt",
 3453:     %%
 3454:     {ok, Pid} = file:open(Name1, [write]),
 3455:     {ok, Name2} = file:pid2name(Pid),
 3456:     Dead = spawn(fun() -> ok end),
 3457:     undefined = file:pid2name(Dead),
 3458:     ok = file:close(Pid),
 3459:     false = is_process_alive(Pid),
 3460:     undefined = file:pid2name(Pid),
 3461:     ok.
 3462: 
 3463: 
 3464: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3465: 
 3466: %% Tests the file open option {read_ahead, Size}.
 3467: 
 3468: read_ahead(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3469:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3470:     File = filename:join(RootDir,
 3471: 			 atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_read_ahead.txt"),
 3472:     Data1 = "asdfghjkl", % Must be
 3473:     Data2 = "qwertyuio", % same
 3474:     Data3 = "zxcvbnm,.", % length
 3475:     Size = length(Data1),
 3476:     Size = length(Data2),
 3477:     Size = length(Data3),
 3478:     %%
 3479:     %% Test caching of normal non-raw file
 3480:     {ok, Fd1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [write]),
 3481:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd1, [Data1|Data1]),
 3482:     timer:sleep(1000), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3483:     {ok, Fd2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [read, {read_ahead, 2*Size}]),
 3484:     {ok, Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd2, Size),
 3485:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(Fd1, Size, Data2),
 3486:     timer:sleep(1000), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3487:     {ok, Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd2, Size), % Will read cached data
 3488:     Data2Data2Data2 = Data2++Data2++Data2,
 3489:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(Fd1, eof, Data2Data2Data2),
 3490:     timer:sleep(1000), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3491:     {ok, Data2Data2Data2} =
 3492: 	?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd2, 3*Size), % Read more than cache buffer
 3493:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd1),
 3494:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd2),
 3495:     %% Test caching of raw file and default parameters
 3496:     {ok, Fd3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [raw, write]),
 3497:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd3, [Data1|Data1]),
 3498:     timer:sleep(1000), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3499:     {ok, Fd4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [raw, read, read_ahead]),
 3500:     {ok, Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd4, Size),
 3501:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(Fd3, Size, Data2),
 3502:     timer:sleep(1000), % Just in case the file system is slow
 3503:     {ok, Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd4, Size), % Will read cached data
 3504:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd3),
 3505:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd4),
 3506:     %% Test if the file position works in combination with read_ahead
 3507:     {ok, Fd5} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [raw, read, write, read_ahead]),
 3508:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:truncate(Fd5),
 3509:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd5, [Data1,Data1|Data3]),
 3510:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd5, bof),
 3511:     {ok, Data1} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd5, Size),
 3512:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(Fd5, Data2),
 3513:     {ok, 0} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(Fd5, bof),
 3514:     Data1Data2Data3 = Data1++Data2++Data3,
 3515:     {ok, Data1Data2Data3} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(Fd5, 3*Size+1),
 3516:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(Fd5),
 3517: 
 3518:     %% Ensure that a read that draws from both the buffer and the file won't
 3519:     %% return anything wonky.
 3520:     SplitData = << <<(I rem 256)>> || I <- lists:seq(1, 1024) >>,
 3521:     file:write_file(File, SplitData),
 3522:     {ok, Fd6} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [raw, read, binary, {read_ahead, 256}]),
 3523:     {ok, <<1>>} = file:read(Fd6, 1),
 3524:     <<1, Shifted:512/binary, _Rest/binary>> = SplitData,
 3525:     {ok, Shifted} = file:read(Fd6, 512),
 3526: 
 3527:     %%
 3528:     [] = flush(),
 3529:     ok.
 3530: 
 3531: 
 3532: 
 3533: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3534: 
 3535: 
 3536: 
 3537: %% Tests the segmenting of large reads.
 3538: segment_read(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3539:     Name = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3540: 			 ?MODULE_STRING ++ "_segment_read"),
 3541:     SegSize = 256*1024,
 3542:     SegCnt = SegSize div 4,
 3543:     Cnt = 4 * SegCnt,
 3544:     ok = create_file(Name, Cnt),
 3545:     %% 
 3546:     %% read_file/1
 3547:     %%
 3548:     {ok, Bin} = ?FILE_MODULE:read_file(Name),
 3549:     true = verify_bin(Bin, 0, Cnt),
 3550:     %%
 3551:     %% read/2
 3552:     %%
 3553:     %% Not segmented
 3554:     {ok, FD1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [read, raw, binary]),
 3555:     {ok, B1a} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD1, SegSize),
 3556:     {ok, B1b} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD1, SegSize),
 3557:     {ok, B1c} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD1, SegSize),
 3558:     {ok, B1d} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD1, SegSize),
 3559:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD1),
 3560:     true = verify_bin(B1a, 0*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3561:     true = verify_bin(B1b, 1*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3562:     true = verify_bin(B1c, 2*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3563:     true = verify_bin(B1d, 3*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3564:     %%
 3565:     %% Segmented
 3566:     {ok, FD2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [read, raw, binary]),
 3567:     {ok, B2a} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD2, 1*SegSize),
 3568:     {ok, B2b} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD2, 2*SegSize),
 3569:     {ok, B2c} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD2, 2*SegSize),
 3570:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD2),
 3571:     true = verify_bin(B2a, 0*SegCnt, 1*SegCnt),
 3572:     true = verify_bin(B2b, 1*SegCnt, 2*SegCnt),
 3573:     true = verify_bin(B2c, 3*SegCnt, 1*SegCnt),
 3574:     %%
 3575:     %% pread/3
 3576:     %%
 3577:     {ok, FD3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [read, raw, binary]),
 3578:     %%
 3579:     %% Not segmented
 3580:     {ok, B3d} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD3, 3*SegSize, SegSize),
 3581:     {ok, B3c} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD3, 2*SegSize, SegSize),
 3582:     {ok, B3b} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD3, 1*SegSize, SegSize),
 3583:     {ok, B3a} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD3, 0*SegSize, SegSize),
 3584:     true = verify_bin(B3a, 0*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3585:     true = verify_bin(B3b, 1*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3586:     true = verify_bin(B3c, 2*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3587:     true = verify_bin(B3d, 3*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3588:     %%
 3589:     %% Segmented
 3590:     {ok, B3g} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD3, 3*SegSize, 2*SegSize),
 3591:     {ok, B3f} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD3, 1*SegSize, 2*SegSize),
 3592:     {ok, B3e} = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD3, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize),
 3593:     true = verify_bin(B3e, 0*SegCnt, 1*SegCnt),
 3594:     true = verify_bin(B3f, 1*SegCnt, 2*SegCnt),
 3595:     true = verify_bin(B3g, 3*SegCnt, 1*SegCnt),
 3596:     %%
 3597:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD3),
 3598:     %%
 3599:     %% pread/2
 3600:     %%
 3601:     {ok, FD5} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [read, raw, binary]),
 3602:     %%
 3603:     %% +---+---+---+---+
 3604:     %% | 4 | 3 | 2 | 1 |
 3605:     %% +---+---+---+---+
 3606:     %% <       ^       >
 3607:     {ok, [B5d, B5c, B5b, B5a]} =
 3608: 	?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD5, [{3*SegSize, SegSize},
 3609: 				 {2*SegSize, SegSize},
 3610: 				 {1*SegSize, SegSize},
 3611: 				 {0*SegSize, SegSize}]),
 3612:     true = verify_bin(B5a, 0*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3613:     true = verify_bin(B5b, 1*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3614:     true = verify_bin(B5c, 2*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3615:     true = verify_bin(B5d, 3*SegCnt, SegCnt),
 3616:     %%
 3617:     %% +---+-------+-------+
 3618:     %% | 3 |   2   |   1   |
 3619:     %% +---+-------+-------+
 3620:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3621:     {ok, [B5g, B5f, B5e]} =
 3622: 	?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD5, [{3*SegSize, 2*SegSize},
 3623: 				 {1*SegSize, 2*SegSize},
 3624: 				 {0*SegSize, 1*SegSize}]),
 3625:     true = verify_bin(B5e, 0*SegCnt, 1*SegCnt),
 3626:     true = verify_bin(B5f, 1*SegCnt, 2*SegCnt),
 3627:     true = verify_bin(B5g, 3*SegCnt, 1*SegCnt),
 3628:     %%
 3629:     %%
 3630:     %% +-------+-----------+
 3631:     %% |   2   |     1     |
 3632:     %% +-------+-----------+
 3633:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3634:     {ok, [B5i, B5h]} =
 3635: 	?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD5, [{2*SegSize, 3*SegSize},
 3636: 				 {0*SegSize, 2*SegSize}]),
 3637:     true = verify_bin(B5h, 0*SegCnt, 2*SegCnt),
 3638:     true = verify_bin(B5i, 2*SegCnt, 2*SegCnt),
 3639:     %%
 3640:     %% +-------+---+---+
 3641:     %% |   3   | 2 | 1 |
 3642:     %% +-------+---+---+
 3643:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3644:     {ok, [B5l, B5k, B5j]} =
 3645: 	?FILE_MODULE:pread(FD5, [{3*SegSize, 1*SegSize},
 3646: 				 {2*SegSize, 1*SegSize},
 3647: 				 {0*SegSize, 2*SegSize}]),
 3648:     true = verify_bin(B5j, 0*SegCnt, 2*SegCnt),
 3649:     true = verify_bin(B5k, 2*SegCnt, 1*SegCnt),
 3650:     true = verify_bin(B5l, 3*SegCnt, 1*SegCnt),
 3651:     %%
 3652:     %% Real time response time test.
 3653:     %%
 3654:     Req = lists:flatten(lists:duplicate(17,
 3655: 					[{2*SegSize, 2*SegSize},
 3656: 					 {0*SegSize, 2*SegSize}])),
 3657:     {{ok, _}, Comment} =
 3658: 	response_analysis(?FILE_MODULE, pread, [FD5, Req]),
 3659:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD5),
 3660:     %%
 3661:     [] = flush(),
 3662:     {comment, Comment}.
 3663: 
 3664: 
 3665: 
 3666: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3667: 
 3668: 
 3669: 
 3670: %% Tests the segmenting of large writes.
 3671: segment_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3672:     Name = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3673: 			 ?MODULE_STRING ++ "_segment_write"),
 3674:     SegSize = 256*1024,
 3675:     SegCnt = SegSize div 4,
 3676:     Cnt = 4 * SegCnt,
 3677:     Bin = create_bin(0, Cnt),
 3678:     %%
 3679:     %% write/2
 3680:     %%
 3681:     %% Not segmented
 3682:     {ok, FD1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write, raw, binary]),
 3683:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD1, subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3684:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD1, subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3685:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD1, subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3686:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD1, subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3687:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD1),
 3688:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3689:     %%
 3690:     %% Segmented
 3691:     {ok, FD2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write, raw, binary]),
 3692:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD2, subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3693:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD2, subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 2*SegSize)),
 3694:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD2, subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3695:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD2),
 3696:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3697:     %%
 3698:     %% +---+---+---+---+
 3699:     %% |   |   |   |   |
 3700:     %% +---+---+---+---+
 3701:     %% <       ^       >
 3702:     ok = write_file(Name, [subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize),
 3703: 			   subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 1*SegSize),
 3704: 			   subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 1*SegSize),
 3705: 			   subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)]),
 3706:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3707:     %%
 3708:     %% +---+-------+---+
 3709:     %% |   |       |   |
 3710:     %% +---+-------+---+
 3711:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3712:     ok = write_file(Name, [subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize),
 3713: 			   subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 2*SegSize),
 3714: 			   subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)]),
 3715:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3716:     %%
 3717:     %% +-------+-------+
 3718:     %% |       |       |
 3719:     %% +-------+-------+
 3720:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3721:     ok = write_file(Name, [subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 2*SegSize),
 3722: 			   subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 2*SegSize)]),
 3723:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3724:     %%
 3725:     %% +-------+---+---+
 3726:     %% |       |   |   |
 3727:     %% +-------+---+---+
 3728:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3729:     ok = write_file(Name, [subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 2*SegSize),
 3730: 			   subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 1*SegSize),
 3731: 			   subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)]),
 3732:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3733:     %%
 3734:     %% pwrite/3
 3735:     %%
 3736:     %% Not segmented
 3737:     {ok, FD3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write, raw, binary]),
 3738:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD3, 3*SegSize,
 3739: 			     subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3740:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD3, 2*SegSize,
 3741: 			     subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3742:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD3, 1*SegSize,
 3743: 			     subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3744:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD3, 0*SegSize,
 3745: 			     subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3746:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD3),
 3747:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3748:     %%
 3749:     %% Segmented
 3750:     {ok, FD4} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write, raw, binary]),
 3751:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD4, 3*SegSize,
 3752: 			     subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3753:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD4, 1*SegSize,
 3754: 			     subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 2*SegSize)),
 3755:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD4, 0*SegSize,
 3756: 			     subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize)),
 3757:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD4),
 3758:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3759: 
 3760: 
 3761: 
 3762:     %%
 3763:     %% pwrite/2
 3764:     %%
 3765:     %% Not segmented
 3766:     {ok, FD5} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write, raw, binary]),
 3767:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD5, [{3*SegSize,
 3768: 				    subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)}]),
 3769:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD5, [{2*SegSize,
 3770: 				    subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 1*SegSize)}]),
 3771:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD5, [{1*SegSize,
 3772: 				    subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 1*SegSize)}]),
 3773:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD5, [{0*SegSize,
 3774: 				    subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize)}]),
 3775:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD5),
 3776:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3777:     %%
 3778:     %% Segmented
 3779:     {ok, FD6} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write, raw, binary]),
 3780:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD6, [{3*SegSize,
 3781: 				    subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)}]),
 3782:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD6, [{1*SegSize,
 3783: 				    subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 2*SegSize)}]),
 3784:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD6, [{0*SegSize,
 3785: 				    subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize)}]),
 3786:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD6),
 3787:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3788:     %%
 3789:     %% +---+---+---+---+
 3790:     %% | 4 | 3 | 2 | 1 |
 3791:     %% +---+---+---+---+
 3792:     %% <       ^       >
 3793:     ok = pwrite_file(Name, [{3*SegSize,
 3794: 			     subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)},
 3795: 			    {2*SegSize,
 3796: 			     subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 1*SegSize)},
 3797: 			    {1*SegSize,
 3798: 			     subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 1*SegSize)},
 3799: 			    {0*SegSize,
 3800: 			     subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize)}]),
 3801:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3802:     %%
 3803:     %% +---+-------+---+
 3804:     %% | 3 |   2   | 1 |
 3805:     %% +---+-------+---+
 3806:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3807:     ok = pwrite_file(Name, [{3*SegSize,
 3808: 			     subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)},
 3809: 			    {1*SegSize,
 3810: 			     subbin(Bin, 1*SegSize, 2*SegSize)},
 3811: 			    {0*SegSize,
 3812: 			     subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 1*SegSize)}]),
 3813:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3814:     %%
 3815:     %% +-------+-------+
 3816:     %% |   2   |   1   |
 3817:     %% +-------+-------+
 3818:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3819:     ok = pwrite_file(Name, [{2*SegSize,
 3820: 			     subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 2*SegSize)},
 3821: 			    {0*SegSize,
 3822: 			     subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 2*SegSize)}]),
 3823:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3824:     %%
 3825:     %% +-------+---+---+
 3826:     %% |   3   | 2 | 1 |
 3827:     %% +-------+---+---+
 3828:     %% <     ^     ^   >
 3829:     ok = pwrite_file(Name, [{3*SegSize,
 3830: 			     subbin(Bin, 3*SegSize, 1*SegSize)},
 3831: 			    {2*SegSize,
 3832: 			     subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 1*SegSize)},
 3833: 			    {0*SegSize,
 3834: 			     subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 2*SegSize)}]),
 3835:     true = verify_file(Name, Cnt),
 3836:     %%
 3837:     %% Real time response time test.
 3838:     %%
 3839:     {ok, FD7} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write, raw, binary]),
 3840:     Req = lists:flatten(lists:duplicate(17,
 3841: 					[{2*SegSize, 
 3842: 					  subbin(Bin, 2*SegSize, 2*SegSize)},
 3843: 					 {0*SegSize,
 3844: 					  subbin(Bin, 0*SegSize, 2*SegSize)}])),
 3845:     {ok, Comment} =
 3846: 	response_analysis(?FILE_MODULE, pwrite, [FD7, Req]),
 3847:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD7),
 3848:     %%
 3849:     [] = flush(),
 3850:     {comment, Comment}.
 3851: 
 3852: 
 3853: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3854: 
 3855: %% Test Dets special indirect pread.
 3856: ipread(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3857:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3858:     ok = ipread_int(Dir, [raw, binary]),
 3859:     ok = ipread_int(Dir, [raw]),
 3860:     ok = ipread_int(Dir, [binary]),
 3861:     ok = ipread_int(Dir, []),
 3862:     ok = ipread_int(Dir, [ram, binary]),
 3863:     ok = ipread_int(Dir, [ram]),
 3864:     %%
 3865:     [] = flush(),
 3866:     ok.
 3867: 
 3868: ipread_int(Dir, ModeList) ->
 3869:     Name =
 3870: 	filename:join(Dir, 
 3871: 		      lists:flatten([?MODULE_STRING, "_ipread",
 3872: 				     lists:map(fun (X) ->
 3873: 						       ["_", atom_to_list(X)]
 3874: 					       end,
 3875: 					       ModeList)])),
 3876:     io:format("ipread_int<~p, ~p>~n", [Name, ModeList]),
 3877:     {Conv, Sizeof} =
 3878: 	case lists:member(binary, ModeList) of
 3879: 	    true ->
 3880: 		{fun (Bin) when is_binary(Bin) -> Bin;
 3881: 		     (List) when is_list(List) -> list_to_binary(List)
 3882: 		 end, 
 3883: 		 fun erlang:byte_size/1};
 3884: 	    false ->
 3885: 		{fun (Bin) when is_binary(Bin) -> binary_to_list(Bin);
 3886: 		     (List) when is_list(List) -> List
 3887: 		 end, 
 3888: 		 fun erlang:length/1}
 3889: 	end,
 3890:     Pos = 4711,
 3891:     Data = Conv("THE QUICK BROWN FOX JUMPS OVER A LAZY DOG"),
 3892:     Size = Sizeof(Data),
 3893:     Init = Conv("                 "),
 3894:     SizeInit = Sizeof(Init),
 3895:     Head = Conv(<<Size:32/big-unsigned, Pos:32/big-unsigned>>),
 3896:     Filler = Conv(bytes($ , Pos-SizeInit-Sizeof(Head))),
 3897:     Size1 = Size+1,
 3898:     SizePos = Size+Pos,
 3899:     %%
 3900:     {ok, FD} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [write, read | ModeList]),
 3901:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:truncate(FD),
 3902:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD, Init),
 3903:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD, Head),
 3904:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD, Filler),
 3905:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD, Data),
 3906:     %% Correct read
 3907:     {ok, {Size, Pos, Data}} =
 3908: 	?FILE_MODULE:ipread_s32bu_p32bu(FD, SizeInit, infinity),
 3909:     %% Invalid header - size > max
 3910:     eof =
 3911: 	?FILE_MODULE:ipread_s32bu_p32bu(FD, SizeInit, Size-1),
 3912:     %% Data block protudes over eof
 3913:     ok =
 3914: 	?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD, SizeInit, 
 3915: 			    <<Size1:32/big-unsigned, 
 3916: 			      Pos:32/big-unsigned>>),
 3917:     {ok, {Size1, Pos, Data}} =
 3918: 	?FILE_MODULE:ipread_s32bu_p32bu(FD, SizeInit, Size1),
 3919:     %% Data block outside file
 3920:     ok =
 3921: 	?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD, SizeInit, 
 3922: 			    <<Size:32/big-unsigned, 
 3923: 			      SizePos:32/big-unsigned>>),
 3924:     {ok, {Size, SizePos, eof}} =
 3925: 	?FILE_MODULE:ipread_s32bu_p32bu(FD, SizeInit, Size),
 3926:     %% Zero size
 3927:     ok =
 3928: 	?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD, SizeInit, 
 3929: 			    <<0:32/big-unsigned, 
 3930: 			      Pos:32/big-unsigned>>),
 3931:     {ok, {0, Pos, eof}} =
 3932: 	?FILE_MODULE:ipread_s32bu_p32bu(FD, SizeInit, Size),
 3933:     %% Invalid header - protudes over eof
 3934:     eof =
 3935: 	?FILE_MODULE:ipread_s32bu_p32bu(FD, 
 3936: 					Pos+Size-(Sizeof(Head)-1), 
 3937: 					infinity),
 3938:     %% Header not even in file
 3939:     eof =
 3940: 	?FILE_MODULE:ipread_s32bu_p32bu(FD, Pos+Size, infinity),
 3941:     %%
 3942:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD),
 3943:     ok.
 3944: 
 3945: 
 3946: 
 3947: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3948: 
 3949: %% Tests interleaved read and writes.
 3950: interleaved_read_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3951:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3952:     File =
 3953: 	filename:join(Dir, ?MODULE_STRING++"interleaved_read_write.txt"),
 3954:     {ok,F1} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [write]),
 3955:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(F1, "data---r1."), % 10 chars each
 3956:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(F1, "data---r2."),
 3957:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(F1, "data---r3."),
 3958:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(F1),
 3959:     {ok,F2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [read, write]),
 3960:     {ok, "data---r1."} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(F2, 10),
 3961:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(F2, "data---w2."),
 3962:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(F2),
 3963:     {ok,F3} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(File, [read]),
 3964:     {ok, "data---r1."} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(F3, 10),
 3965:     {ok, "data---w2."} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(F3, 10),
 3966:     {ok, "data---r3."} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(F3, 10),
 3967:     eof = ?FILE_MODULE:read(F3, 1),
 3968:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(F2),
 3969:     %%
 3970:     [] = flush(),
 3971:     ok.
 3972: 
 3973: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3974: 
 3975: %% OTP-5814. eval/consult/script return correct line numbers.
 3976: otp_5814(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3977:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 3978:     File = filename:join(PrivDir, "otp_5814"),
 3979:     Path = [PrivDir],
 3980:     ok = file:write_file(File, <<"{a,b,c}.
 3981:                                         a.
 3982: b.
 3983: c.
 3984: {d,e,
 3985:  [}.">>),
 3986:     {error, {6,erl_parse,_}} = file:eval(File),
 3987:  {error, {6,erl_parse,_}} = file:consult(File),
 3988:  {error, {6,erl_parse,_}} = file:path_consult(Path, File),
 3989:  {error, {6,erl_parse,_}} = file:path_eval(Path, File),
 3990:  {error, {6,erl_parse,_}} = file:script(File),
 3991:  {error, {6,erl_parse,_}} = file:path_script(Path, File),
 3992: 
 3993:  ok = file:write_file(File, <<>>),
 3994:  {error, {1,file,undefined_script}} = file:path_script(Path, File),
 3995: 
 3996:     %% The error is not propagated...
 3997:  ok = file:write_file(File, <<"a.
 3998:                                         b.
 3999: 1/0.">>),
 4000:     {error, {3, file, {error, badarith, _}}} = file:eval(File),
 4001: 
 4002: ok = file:write_file(File, <<"erlang:raise(throw, apa, []).">>),
 4003: {error, {1, file, {throw, apa, _}}} = file:eval(File),
 4004: 
 4005: file:delete(File),
 4006: ok.
