 4009: 
 4010: %% OTP-10852. +fnu and latin1 filenames.
 4011: otp_10852(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4012:     case no_untranslatable_names() of
 4013:         fs ->
 4014:             {skip,"Not a problem on this FS"};
 4015: 	_ ->
 4016: 	    otp_10852_1(Config)
 4017:     end.
 4018: 
 4019: otp_10852_1(Config) ->
 4020:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["+fnu"]),
 4021:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 4022:     B = filename:join(Dir, <<"\xE4">>),
 4023:     ok = rpc_call(Node, get_cwd, [B]),
 4024:     {error, no_translation} = rpc_call(Node, set_cwd, [B]),
 4025:     ok = rpc_call(Node, delete, [B]),
 4026:     ok = rpc_call(Node, rename, [B, B]),
 4027:     ok = rpc_call(Node, read_file_info, [B]),
 4028:     ok = rpc_call(Node, read_link_info, [B]),
 4029:     ok = rpc_call(Node, read_link, [B]),
 4030:     ok = rpc_call(Node, write_file_info, [B,#file_info{}]),
 4031:     ok = rpc_call(Node, list_dir, [B]),
 4032:     ok = rpc_call(Node, list_dir_all, [B]),
 4033:     ok = rpc_call(Node, read_file, [B]),
 4034:     ok = rpc_call(Node, make_link, [B,B]),
 4035:     case rpc_call(Node, make_symlink, [B,B]) of
 4036:         {error, eilseq} ->
 4037:             %% Some versions of OS X refuse to create files with illegal names.
 4038:             {unix,darwin} = os:type();
 4039:         {error, eperm} ->
 4040:             %% The test user might not have permission to create symlinks.
 4041:             {win32,_} = os:type();
 4042:         ok ->
 4043:             ok
 4044:     end,
 4045:     ok = rpc_call(Node, delete, [B]),
 4046:     case rpc_call(Node, make_dir, [B]) of
 4047:         {error, eilseq} ->
 4048:             {unix,darwin} = os:type();
 4049:         ok ->
 4050:             ok
 4051:     end,
 4052:     ok = rpc_call(Node, del_dir, [B]),
 4053:     case rpc_call(Node, write_file, [B,B]) of
 4054:         {error, eilseq} ->
 4055:             {unix,darwin} = os:type();
 4056:         ok ->
 4057:             {ok, Fd} = rpc_call(Node, open, [B,[read]]),
 4058:             ok = rpc_call(Node, close, [Fd]),
 4059:             {ok,0} = rpc_call(Node, copy, [B,B]),
 4060:             {ok, Fd2, B} = rpc_call(Node, path_open, [["."], B, [read]]),
 4061:             ok = rpc_call(Node, close, [Fd2])
 4062:     end,
 4063:     peer:stop(Peer),
 4064:     ok.
 4065: 
 4066: rpc_call(N, F, As) ->
 4067:     case rpc:call(N, ?FILE_MODULE, F, As) of
 4068:         {error, enotsup} -> ok;
 4069:         {error, enoent} -> ok;
 4070:         {error, badarg} -> ok;
 4071:         Else -> Else
 4072:     end.
 4073: 
 4074: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4075: 
 4076: large_file() ->
 4077:     [{timetrap,{minutes,20}}].
 4078: 
 4079: %% Tests positioning in large files (> 4G).
 4080: large_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4081:     run_large_file_test(Config,
 4082: 			fun(Name) -> do_large_file(Name) end,
 4083: 			"_large_file").
 4084: 
 4085: do_large_file(Name) ->
 4086:     S = "1234567890",
 4087:     L = length(S),
 4088:     R = lists:reverse(S),
 4089:     P = 1 bsl 32,
 4090:     Ss = lists:sort(S),
 4091:     Rs = lists:reverse(Ss),
 4092:     {ok,F}  = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [raw,read,write]),
 4093:     ok      = ?FILE_MODULE:write(F, S),
 4094:     {ok,P}  = ?FILE_MODULE:position(F, P),
 4095:     ok      = ?FILE_MODULE:write(F, R),
 4096:     {ok,0}  = ?FILE_MODULE:position(F, bof),
 4097:     {ok,S}  = ?FILE_MODULE:read(F, L),
 4098:     {ok,P}  = ?FILE_MODULE:position(F, {eof,-L}),
 4099:     {ok,R}  = ?FILE_MODULE:read(F, L+1),
 4100:     {ok,S}  = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(F, 0, L),
 4101:     {ok,R}  = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(F, P, L+1),
 4102:     ok      = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(F, 0, Ss),
 4103:     ok      = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(F, P, Rs),
 4104:     {ok,0}  = ?FILE_MODULE:position(F, bof),
 4105:     {ok,Ss} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(F, L),
 4106:     {ok,P}  = ?FILE_MODULE:position(F, {eof,-L}),
 4107:     {ok,Rs} = ?FILE_MODULE:read(F, L+1),
 4108:     ok      = ?FILE_MODULE:close(F),
 4109:     %% Reopen the file with 'append'; used to fail on Windows causing
 4110:     %% writes to go to the beginning of the file for files > 4GB.
 4111:     PL = P + L,
 4112:     PLL = PL + L,
 4113:     {ok,F1}  = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [raw,read,write,append]),
 4114:     ok       = ?FILE_MODULE:write(F1, R),
 4115:     {ok,PLL} = ?FILE_MODULE:position(F1, {cur,0}),
 4116:     {ok,Rs}  = ?FILE_MODULE:pread(F1, P, L),
 4117:     {ok,PL}  = ?FILE_MODULE:position(F1, {eof,-L}),
 4118:     {ok,R}   = ?FILE_MODULE:read(F1, L+1),
 4119:     ok       = ?FILE_MODULE:close(F1),
 4120: 
 4121:     %% Reopen the file try to read all of it; used to fail on macOS
 4122:     %% We open with binary in order to not get a memory explosion.
 4123:     {ok, F2} = ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [raw,read,binary]),
 4124:     IsWindows = element(1,os:type()) =:= win32,
 4125:     case {?FILE_MODULE:read(F2, P), erlang:system_info(wordsize)} of
 4126:         {{ok, B}, 8} ->
 4127:             P = byte_size(B);
 4128:         {eof, 8} when IsWindows ->
 4129:             ok;
 4130:         {eof, 4} ->
 4131:             %% Cannot read such large files on 32-bit
 4132:             ok
 4133:     end,
 4134:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(F2),
 4135: 
 4136:     ok.
 4137: 
 4138: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4139: 
 4140: large_write() ->
 4141:     [{timetrap,{minutes,20}}].
 4142: 
 4143: large_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4144:     run_large_file_test(Config,
 4145: 			fun(Name) -> do_large_write(Name) end,
 4146: 			"_large_write").
 4147: 
 4148: do_large_write(Name) ->
 4149:     Memsize = memsize(),
 4150:     io:format("Memsize = ~w Bytes~n", [Memsize]),
 4151:     case {erlang:system_info(wordsize),Memsize} of
 4152: 	{4,_} ->
 4153: 	    {skip,"Needs a 64-bit emulator"};
 4154: 	{8,N} when N < 6 bsl 30 ->
 4155: 	    {skip,
 4156: 	     "This machine has < 6 GB  memory: "
 4157: 	     ++integer_to_list(N)};
 4158: 	{8,_} ->
 4159: 	    Size = 4*1024*1024*1024+1,
 4160: 	    Bin = <<0:Size/unit:8>>,
 4161: 	    ok = file:write_file(Name, Bin),
 4162: 	    {ok,#file_info{size=Size}} = file:read_file_info(Name),
 4163: 
 4164:             %% Even multiples of MAX_SYSIOVEC_IOVLEN would cause a crash
 4165:             ok = file:write_file(Name, binary:part(Bin, 0, 1 bsl 31)),
 4166: 	    {ok,#file_info{size=1 bsl 31}} = file:read_file_info(Name),
 4167: 	    ok
 4168:     end.
 4169: 
 4170: large_read() ->
 4171:     [{timetrap,{minutes,20}}].
 4172: 
 4173: large_read(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4174:     run_large_file_test(Config,
 4175: 			fun(Name) -> do_large_read(Name) end,
 4176: 			"_large_read").
 4177: 
 4178: do_large_read(Name) ->
 4179:     Memsize = memsize(),
 4180:     io:format("Memsize = ~w Bytes~n", [Memsize]),
 4181:     case {erlang:system_info(wordsize),Memsize} of
 4182:         {4,_} ->
 4183:             {skip,"Needs a 64-bit emulator"};
 4184:         {8,N} when N < 14 bsl 30 ->
 4185:             {skip,
 4186:                 "This machine has < 14 GB memory: "
 4187:                 ++integer_to_list(N)};
 4188:         {8,_} ->
 4189:             Size = 4*1024*1024*1024+1,
 4190:             Bin = <<512:Size/unit:8>>,
 4191: 
 4192:             ok = file:write_file(Name, Bin),
 4193:             {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(Name),
 4194: 
 4195:             ok
 4196:     end.
 4197: 
 4198: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4199: 
 4200: %% Benchmarks
 4201: %%
 4202: %% Note that we only measure the time it takes to run the isolated file
 4203: %% operations and that the actual test runtime can differ significantly,
 4204: %% especially on the write side as the files need to be truncated before
 4205: %% writing.
 4206: 
 4207: large_writes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4208:     Modes = [raw, binary],
 4209:     OpCount = 4096,
 4210:     Data = <<0:(64 bsl 10)/unit:8>>,
 4211:     run_write_benchmark(Config, Modes, OpCount, Data).
 4212: 
 4213: large_writes_delayed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4214:     %% Each write is exactly as large as the delay buffer, causing the writes
 4215:     %% to pass through each time, giving us a decent idea of how much overhead
 4216:     %% delayed_write adds.
 4217:     Modes = [raw, binary, {delayed_write, 64 bsl 10, 2000}],
 4218:     OpCount = 4096,
 4219:     Data = <<0:(64 bsl 10)/unit:8>>,
 4220:     run_write_benchmark(Config, Modes, OpCount, Data).
 4221: 
 4222: tiny_writes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4223:     Modes = [raw, binary],
 4224:     OpCount = 512 bsl 10,
 4225:     Data = <<0>>,
 4226:     run_write_benchmark(Config, Modes, OpCount, Data).
 4227: 
 4228: tiny_writes_delayed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4229:     Modes = [raw, binary, {delayed_write, 512 bsl 10, 2000}],
 4230:     OpCount = 512 bsl 10,
 4231:     Data = <<0>>,
 4232:     run_write_benchmark(Config, Modes, OpCount, Data).
 4233: 
 4234: %% The read benchmarks assume that "benchmark_scratch_file" has been filled by
 4235: %% the write benchmarks.
 4236: 
 4237: tiny_reads(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4238:     Modes = [raw, binary],
 4239:     OpCount = 512 bsl 10,
 4240:     run_read_benchmark(Config, Modes, OpCount, 1).
 4241: 
 4242: tiny_reads_ahead(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4243:     Modes = [raw, binary, {read_ahead, 512 bsl 10}],
 4244:     OpCount = 512 bsl 10,
 4245:     run_read_benchmark(Config, Modes, OpCount, 1).
 4246: 
 4247: run_write_benchmark(Config, Modes, OpCount, Data) ->
 4248:     run_benchmark(Config, [write | Modes], OpCount, fun file:write/2, Data).
 4249: 
 4250: run_read_benchmark(Config, Modes, OpCount, OpSize) ->
 4251:     run_benchmark(Config, [read | Modes], OpCount, fun file:read/2, OpSize).
 4252: 
 4253: run_benchmark(Config, Modes, OpCount, Fun, Arg) ->
 4254:     ScratchDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 4255:     Path = filename:join(ScratchDir, "benchmark_scratch_file"),
 4256:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(Path, Modes),
 4257:     submit_throughput_results(Fun, [Fd, Arg], OpCount).
 4258: 
 4259: submit_throughput_results(Fun, Args, Times) ->
 4260:     MSecs = measure_repeated_file_op(Fun, Args, Times, millisecond),
 4261:     IOPS = trunc(Times * (1000 / MSecs)),
 4262:     ct_event:notify(#event{ name = benchmark_data, data = [{value,IOPS}] }),
 4263:     {comment, io_lib:format("~p IOPS, ~p ms", [IOPS, trunc(MSecs)])}.
 4264: 
 4265: measure_repeated_file_op(Fun, Args, Times, Unit) ->
 4266:     Start = os:perf_counter(Unit),
 4267:     repeated_apply(Fun, Args, Times),
 4268:     os:perf_counter(Unit) - Start.
 4269: 
 4270: repeated_apply(_F, _Args, Times) when Times =< 0 ->
 4271:     ok;
 4272: repeated_apply(F, Args, Times) ->
 4273:     erlang:apply(F, Args),
 4274:     repeated_apply(F, Args, Times - 1).
 4275: 
 4276: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4277: 
 4278: 
 4279: response_analysis(Module, Function, Arguments) ->
 4280:     Parent = self(),
 4281:     erlang:yield(), % Schedule out before test
 4282:     Child =
 4283: 	spawn_link(
 4284: 	  fun () ->
 4285: 		  receive {Parent, start, Ts} -> ok end,
 4286: 		  Stat = 
 4287: 		      iterate(response_stat(response_stat(init, Ts),
 4288: 					    micro_ts()),
 4289: 			      done,
 4290: 			      fun (S) ->
 4291: 				      erlang:yield(),
 4292: 				      receive
 4293: 					  {Parent, stop} ->
 4294: 					      done
 4295: 				      after 0 ->
 4296: 					      response_stat(S, micro_ts())
 4297: 				      end
 4298: 			      end),
 4299: 		  Parent ! {self(), stopped, response_stat(Stat, micro_ts())}
 4300: 	  end),
 4301:     Child ! {Parent, start, micro_ts()},
 4302:     Result = apply(Module, Function, Arguments),
 4303:     Child ! {Parent, stop},
 4304:     {N, Sum, _, M, Max} = receive {Child, stopped, X} -> X end,
 4305:     Mean_ms = (0.001*Sum) / (N-1),
 4306:     Max_ms = 0.001 * Max,
 4307:     Comment =
 4308: 	lists:flatten(
 4309: 	  io_lib:format(
 4310: 	    "Scheduling interval: Mean = ~.3f ms, "
 4311: 	    ++"Max = ~.3f ms for no ~p of ~p.~n",
 4312: 	    [Mean_ms, Max_ms, M, (N-1)])),
 4313:     {Result, Comment}.
 4314: 
 4315: micro_ts() ->
 4316:     erlang:monotonic_time(microsecond).
 4317: 
 4318: response_stat(init, Ts) ->
 4319:     {0, 0, Ts, 0, 0};
 4320: response_stat({N, Sum, Ts0, M, Max}, Ts) ->
 4321:     D = Ts - Ts0,
 4322:     if D > Max ->
 4323: 	    {N+1, Sum+D, Ts, N, D};
 4324:        true ->
 4325: 	    {N+1, Sum+D, Ts, M, Max}
 4326:     end.
 4327: 
 4328: 
 4329: 
 4330: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4331: 
 4332: 
 4333: 
 4334: %% This function is kept just for benchmarking reasons.
 4335: %% create_file/2 below is some 44 times faster.
 4336: 
 4337: create_file_slow(Name, N) when is_integer(N), N >= 0 ->
 4338:     {ok, FD} =
 4339: 	?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [raw, write, delayed_write, binary]),
 4340:     ok = create_file_slow(FD, 0, N),
 4341:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD),
 4342:     ok.
 4343: 
 4344: create_file_slow(_FD, M, M) ->
 4345:     ok;
 4346: create_file_slow(FD, M, N) ->
 4347:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD, <<M:32/unsigned>>),
 4348:     create_file_slow(FD, M+1, N).
 4349: 
 4350: 
 4351: 
 4352: %% Creates a file 'Name' containing 'N' unsigned 32 bit integers 
 4353: %% from 0 to N-1.
 4354: 
 4355: create_file(Name, N) when is_integer(N), N >= 0 ->
 4356:     {ok, FD} =
 4357: 	?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [raw, write, delayed_write, binary]),
 4358:     ok = create_file(FD, 0, N),
 4359:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD),
 4360:     ok.
 4361: 
 4362: create_file(_FD, M, M) ->
 4363:     ok;
 4364: create_file(FD, M, N) when M + 1024 =< N ->
 4365:     create_file(FD, M, M + 1024, []),
 4366:     create_file(FD, M + 1024, N);
 4367: create_file(FD, M, N) ->
 4368:     create_file(FD, M, N, []).
 4369: 
 4370: create_file(FD, M, M, R) ->
 4371:     ok = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD, R);
 4372: create_file(FD, M, N0, R) when M + 8 =< N0 ->
 4373:     N1  = N0-1,  N2  = N0-2,  N3  = N0-3,  N4  = N0-4, 
 4374:     N5  = N0-5,  N6  = N0-6,  N7  = N0-7,  N8  = N0-8, 
 4375:     create_file(FD, M, N8, 
 4376: 		[<<N8:32/unsigned,  N7:32/unsigned,
 4377: 		   N6:32/unsigned,  N5:32/unsigned,
 4378: 		   N4:32/unsigned,  N3:32/unsigned,
 4379: 		   N2:32/unsigned,  N1:32/unsigned>> | R]);
 4380: create_file(FD, M, N0, R) ->
 4381:     N1 = N0-1,
 4382:     create_file(FD, M, N1, [<<N1:32/unsigned>> | R]).
 4383: 
 4384: 
 4385: 
 4386: create_bin(M, N) when is_integer(M), is_integer(N), N >= 0, M >= 0 ->
 4387:     create_bin(M, M+N, []).
 4388: 
 4389: create_bin(N, N, R) ->
 4390:     list_to_binary(R);
 4391: create_bin(M, N0, R) when M+8 =< N0 ->
 4392:     N1  = N0-1,  N2  = N0-2,  N3  = N0-3,  N4  = N0-4, 
 4393:     N5  = N0-5,  N6  = N0-6,  N7  = N0-7,  N8  = N0-8, 
 4394:     create_bin(M, N8,
 4395: 	       [<<N8:32/unsigned,  N7:32/unsigned, 
 4396: 		  N6:32/unsigned,  N5:32/unsigned,
 4397: 		  N4:32/unsigned,  N3:32/unsigned,
 4398: 		  N2:32/unsigned,  N1:32/unsigned>> | R]);
 4399: create_bin(M, N0, R) ->
 4400:     N1 = N0-1,
 4401:     create_bin(M, N1, [<<N1:32/unsigned>> | R]).
 4402: 
 4403: 
 4404: 
 4405: 
 4406: verify_bin(<<>>, _, 0) ->
 4407:     true;
 4408: verify_bin(<<>>, _, _) ->
 4409:     false;
 4410: verify_bin(Bin, N, Cnt) ->
 4411:     N0 = N + 0, N1 = N + 1, N2 = N + 2, N3 = N + 3, 
 4412:     N4 = N + 4, N5 = N + 5, N6 = N + 6, N7 = N + 7, 
 4413:     case Bin of
 4414: 	<<N0:32/unsigned, N1:32/unsigned, N2:32/unsigned, N3:32/unsigned, 
 4415: 	  N4:32/unsigned, N5:32/unsigned, N6:32/unsigned, N7:32/unsigned,
 4416: 	  B/binary>> ->
 4417: 	    verify_bin(B, N+8, Cnt-8);
 4418: 	<<N:32/unsigned, B/binary>> ->
 4419: 	    verify_bin(B, N+1, Cnt-1);
 4420: 	_ ->
 4421: 	    false
 4422:     end.
 4423: 
 4424: 
 4425: 
 4426: verify_file(Name, N) when is_integer(N), N >= 0 ->
 4427:     case ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [raw, read, binary]) of
 4428: 	{ok, FD} ->
 4429: 	    Result = verify_file(FD, 0, 64*1024, N),
 4430: 	    ok = ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD),
 4431: 	    Result;
 4432: 	Error ->
 4433: 	    Error
 4434:     end.
 4435: 
 4436: verify_file(FD, N, _, N) ->
 4437:     case ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD, 1) of
 4438: 	eof ->
 4439: 	    true;
 4440: 	{ok, _} ->
 4441: 	    false
 4442:     end;
 4443: verify_file(FD, M, Cnt, N) when M+Cnt =< N ->
 4444:     case ?FILE_MODULE:read(FD, 4*Cnt) of
 4445: 	{ok, Bin} ->
 4446: 	    case verify_bin(Bin, M, Cnt) of
 4447: 		true ->
 4448: 		    verify_file(FD, M+Cnt, Cnt, N);
 4449: 		false ->
 4450: 		    false
 4451: 	    end;
 4452: 	_ ->
 4453: 	    false
 4454:     end;
 4455: verify_file(FD, M, _Cnt, N) ->
 4456:     verify_file(FD, M, N-M, N).
 4457: 
 4458: 
 4459: 
 4460: subbin(Bin, M, N) ->
 4461:     <<_:M/binary, B:N/binary, _/binary>> = Bin,
 4462:     B.
 4463: 
 4464: 
 4465: 
 4466: write_file(Name, Data) ->
 4467:     case ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [raw, write, binary]) of
 4468: 	{ok, FD} ->
 4469: 	    Result = ?FILE_MODULE:write(FD, Data),
 4470: 	    case {Result, ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD)} of
 4471: 		{ok, R} -> R;
 4472: 		_ -> Result
 4473: 	    end;
 4474: 	Error ->
 4475: 	    Error
 4476:     end.
 4477: 
 4478: pwrite_file(Name, Data) ->
 4479:     case ?FILE_MODULE:open(Name, [raw, write, binary]) of
 4480: 	{ok, FD} ->
 4481: 	    Result = ?FILE_MODULE:pwrite(FD, Data),
 4482: 	    case {Result, ?FILE_MODULE:close(FD)} of
 4483: 		{ok, R} -> R;
 4484: 		_ -> Result
 4485: 	    end;
 4486: 	Error ->
 4487: 	    Error
 4488:     end.
 4489: 
 4490: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4491: %% Read_line tests
 4492: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

 4494: 
 4495: read_line_testdata(PrivDir) ->
 4496:     All0 = [{fun read_line_create0/1,"Testdata1.txt",5,10},
 4497: 	    {fun read_line_create1/1,"Testdata2.txt",401,802},
 4498: 	    {fun read_line_create2/1,"Testdata3.txt",1,2},
 4499: 	    {fun read_line_create3/1,"Testdata4.txt",601,fail},
 4500: 	    {fun read_line_create4/1,"Testdata5.txt",601,1002},
 4501: 	    {fun read_line_create5/1,"Testdata6.txt",601,1202},
 4502: 	    {fun read_line_create6/1,"Testdata7.txt",601,1202},
 4503: 	    {fun read_line_create7/1,"Testdata8.txt",4001,8002}],
 4504:     [ {A,filename:join([PrivDir,B]),C,D} || {A,B,C,D} <- All0 ].
 4505: 
 4506: read_line_create_files(TestData) ->
 4507:     [ Function(File) || {Function,File,_,_} <- TestData ].
 4508: 
 4509: read_line_remove_files(TestData) ->
 4510:     [ file:delete(File) || {_Function,File,_,_} <- TestData ].
 4511: 
 4512: %% read_line with ?PRIM_FILE.
 4513: read_line_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4514:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 4515:     All = read_line_testdata(PrivDir),
 4516:     read_line_create_files(All),
 4517:     [ begin
 4518: 	  io:format("read_line_all: ~s~n",[File]),
 4519: 	  {X,_} = read_line_all(File),
 4520: 	  true
 4521:       end || {_,File,X,_} <- All ],
 4522:     [ begin
 4523: 	  io:format("read_line_all_alternating: ~s~n",[File]),
 4524: 	  {Y,_} = read_line_all_alternating(File),
 4525: 	  true
 4526:       end || {_,File,_,Y} <- All , Y =/= fail],
 4527:     [ begin
 4528: 	  io:format("read_line_all_alternating (failing as should): ~s~n",[File]),
 4529: 	  {'EXIT',_} = (catch read_line_all_alternating(File)),
 4530: 	  true
 4531:       end || {_,File,_,Y} <- All , Y =:= fail],
 4532:     read_line_remove_files(All),
 4533:     ok.
 4534: %% read_line with file.
 4535: read_line_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4536:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 4537:     All = read_line_testdata(PrivDir),
 4538:     read_line_create_files(All),
 4539:     [ begin
 4540: 	  io:format("read_line_all: ~s~n",[File]),
 4541: 	  {X,_} = read_line_all2(File),
 4542: 	  true
 4543:       end || {_,File,X,_} <- All ],
 4544:     [ begin
 4545: 	  io:format("read_line_all_alternating: ~s~n",[File]),
 4546: 	  {Y,_} = read_line_all_alternating2(File),
 4547: 	  true
 4548:       end || {_,File,_,Y} <- All , Y =/= fail],
 4549:     [ begin
 4550: 	  io:format("read_line_all_alternating (failing as should): ~s~n",[File]),
 4551: 	  {'EXIT',_} = (catch read_line_all_alternating2(File)),
 4552: 	  true
 4553:       end || {_,File,_,Y} <- All , Y =:= fail],
 4554:     read_line_remove_files(All),
 4555:     ok.
 4556: %% read_line with raw file.

 4558:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),

 4571:     [ begin

 4575:       end || {_,File,_,Y} <- All , Y =:= fail],

 4577:     ok.

 4599:     ok.
 4600: 
 4601: rl_lines() ->
 4602:     [ <<"hej">>,<<"hopp">>,<<"i">>,<<"lingon\rskogen">>].
 4603: 
 4604: read_line_create0(Filename) ->
 4605:     {ok,F} = file:open(Filename,[write]),
 4606:     L = rl_lines(),
 4607:     [ file:write(F,[R,<<"\r\n">>]) || R <- L ], 
 4608:     file:write(F,<<"Inget radslut\r">>),
 4609:     file:close(F).
 4610: read_line_create1(Filename) ->
 4611:     {ok,F} = file:open(Filename,[write]),
 4612:     L = rl_lines(),
 4613:     [ begin
 4614: 	  [ file:write(F,[R,<<"\r\n">>]) || R <- L ], 
 4615: 	  file:write(F,<<"Inget radslut\r">>)
 4616:       end || _ <- lists:seq(1,100)],
 4617:     file:close(F).
 4618: read_line_create2(Filename) ->
 4619:     {ok,F} = file:open(Filename,[write]),
 4620:     L = rl_lines(),
 4621:     [ begin
 4622: 	  [ file:write(F,[R]) || R <- L ], 
 4623: 	  file:write(F,<<"Inget radslut\r">>)
 4624:       end || _ <- lists:seq(1,200)],
 4625:     file:write(F,<<"\r\n">>),
 4626:     file:close(F).
 4627: 
 4628: read_line_create3(Filename) ->
 4629:     {ok,F} = file:open(Filename,[write]),
 4630:     L = rl_lines(),
 4631:     [ begin
 4632: 	  file:write(F,<<"\r\n">>),
 4633: 	  file:write(F,<<"\r\n">>),
 4634: 	  [ file:write(F,[R,<<"\r\n">>]) || R <- L ], 
 4635: 	  file:write(F,<<"Inget radslut\r">>)
 4636:       end || _ <- lists:seq(1,100)],
 4637:     file:close(F).
 4638:

 4644: 	  file:write(F,<<"\n">>),
 4645: 	  [ file:write(F,[R,<<"\r\n">>]) || R <- L ], 
 4646: 	  file:write(F,<<"Inget radslut\r">>)
 4647:       end || _ <- lists:seq(1,100)],
 4648:     file:close(F).

 4679: 
 4680: read_line_all(Filename) ->
 4681:     {ok,F} = ?PRIM_FILE:open(Filename,[read,binary]),
 4682:     X=read_rl_lines(F),
 4683:     ?PRIM_FILE:close(F),
 4684:     Bin = list_to_binary([B || {ok,B} <- X]),
 4685:     Bin = re:replace(list_to_binary([element(2,file:read_file(Filename))]),
 4686: 		     "\r\n","\n",[global,{return,binary}]),
 4687:     {length(X),Bin}.
 4688: 
 4689: read_line_all2(Filename) ->
 4690:     {ok,F} = file:open(Filename,[read,binary]),
 4691:     X=read_rl_lines2(F),
 4692:     file:close(F),
 4693:     Bin = list_to_binary([B || {ok,B} <- X]),
 4694:     Bin = re:replace(list_to_binary([element(2,file:read_file(Filename))]),
 4695: 		     "\r\n","\n",[global,{return,binary}]),
 4696:     {length(X),Bin}.
 4697: 
 4698: read_line_all3(Filename) ->
 4699:     {ok,F} = file:open(Filename,[read,binary,raw]),
 4700:     X=read_rl_lines2(F),
 4701:     file:close(F),
 4702:     Bin = list_to_binary([B || {ok,B} <- X]),
 4703:     Bin = re:replace(list_to_binary([element(2,file:read_file(Filename))]),
 4704: 		     "\r\n","\n",[global,{return,binary}]),
 4705:     {length(X),Bin}.
 4706: read_line_all4(Filename) ->
 4707:     {ok,F} = file:open(Filename,[read,binary,raw,{read_ahead,8192}]),
 4708:     X=read_rl_lines2(F),
 4709:     file:close(F),
 4710:     Bin = list_to_binary([B || {ok,B} <- X]),
 4711:     Bin = re:replace(list_to_binary([element(2,file:read_file(Filename))]),
 4712: 		     "\r\n","\n",[global,{return,binary}]),
 4713:     {length(X),Bin}.
 4714: 
 4715: read_rl_lines(F) ->
 4716:     case ?PRIM_FILE:read_line(F) of
 4717: 	eof ->
 4718: 	    [];
 4719: 	{error,X} ->
 4720: 	    {error,X};
 4721: 	List ->
 4722: 	    [List | read_rl_lines(F)]
 4723:     end.
 4724: 
 4725: read_rl_lines2(F) ->
 4726:     case file:read_line(F) of
 4727: 	eof ->
 4728: 	    [];
 4729: 	{error,X} ->
 4730: 	    {error,X};
 4731: 	List ->
 4732: 	    [List | read_rl_lines2(F)]
 4733:     end.
 4734: 
 4735: read_line_all_alternating(Filename) ->
 4736:     {ok,F} = ?PRIM_FILE:open(Filename,[read,binary]),
 4737:     X=read_rl_lines(F,true),
 4738:     ?PRIM_FILE:close(F),
 4739:     Bin = list_to_binary([B || {ok,B} <- X]),
 4740:     Bin = re:replace(list_to_binary([element(2,file:read_file(Filename))]),
 4741: 		     "\r\n","\n",[global,{return,binary}]),
 4742:     {length(X),Bin}.
 4743: 
 4744: read_line_all_alternating2(Filename) ->
 4745:     {ok,F} = file:open(Filename,[read,binary]),
 4746:     X=read_rl_lines2(F,true),
 4747:     file:close(F),
 4748:     Bin = list_to_binary([B || {ok,B} <- X]),
 4749:     Bin = re:replace(list_to_binary([element(2,file:read_file(Filename))]),
 4750: 		     "\r\n","\n",[global,{return,binary}]),
 4751:     {length(X),Bin}.
 4752: read_line_all_alternating3(Filename) ->
 4753:     {ok,F} = file:open(Filename,[read,binary,raw]),
 4754:     X=read_rl_lines2(F,true),
 4755:     file:close(F),
 4756:     Bin = list_to_binary([B || {ok,B} <- X]),
 4757:     Bin = re:replace(list_to_binary([element(2,file:read_file(Filename))]),
 4758: 		     "\r\n","\n",[global,{return,binary}]),
 4759:     {length(X),Bin}.
 4760: read_line_all_alternating4(Filename) ->
 4761:     {ok,F} = file:open(Filename,[read,binary,raw,{read_ahead,8192}]),
 4762:     X=read_rl_lines2(F,true),
 4763:     file:close(F),
 4764:     Bin = list_to_binary([B || {ok,B} <- X]),
 4765:     Bin = re:replace(list_to_binary([element(2,file:read_file(Filename))]),
 4766: 		     "\r\n","\n",[global,{return,binary}]),
 4767:     {length(X),Bin}.
 4768: 
 4769: read_rl_lines(F,Alternate) ->
 4770:     case begin
 4771: 	     case Alternate of
 4772: 		 true -> ?PRIM_FILE:read(F,1);
 4773: 		 false -> ?PRIM_FILE:read_line(F)
 4774: 	     end 
 4775: 	 end of
 4776: 	eof ->
 4777: 	    [];
 4778: 	{error,X} ->
 4779: 	    {error,X};
 4780: 	List ->
 4781: 	    [List | read_rl_lines(F,not Alternate)]
 4782:     end.
 4783: read_rl_lines2(F,Alternate) ->
 4784:     case begin
 4785: 	     case Alternate of
 4786: 		 true -> file:read(F,1);
 4787: 		 false -> file:read_line(F)
 4788: 	     end 
 4789: 	 end of
 4790: 	eof ->
 4791: 	    [];
 4792: 	{error,X} ->
 4793: 	    {error,X};
 4794: 	List ->
 4795: 	    [List | read_rl_lines2(F,not Alternate)]
 4796:     end.
 4797: 
 4798: 
 4799: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4800: 
 4801: bytes(B, N)
 4802:   when is_integer(B), 0 =< B, B =< 255, is_integer(N), N > 2, N band 1 == 0 ->
 4803:     [bytes(B, N bsr 1), bytes(B, N bsr 1)];
 4804: bytes(B, 0)
 4805:   when is_integer(B), 0 =< B, B =< 255 ->
 4806:     [];
 4807: bytes(B, 2)
 4808:   when is_integer(B), 0 =< B, B =< 255 ->
 4809:     [B, B];
 4810: bytes(B, N)
 4811:   when is_integer(B), 0 =< B, B =< 255, is_integer(N), N > 0 ->
 4812:     [B, bytes(B, N-1)].
 4813: 
 4814: 
 4815: %% A simple loop construct.
 4816: %%
 4817: %% Calls 'Fun' with argument 'Start' first and then repeatedly with
 4818: %% its returned value (state) until 'Fun' returns 'Stop'. Then
 4819: %% the last state value that was not 'Stop' is returned.
 4820: 
 4821: iterate(Start, Done, Fun) when is_function(Fun) ->
 4822:     iterate(Start, Done, Fun, Start).
 4823: 
 4824: iterate(Done, Done, _Fun, I) ->
 4825:     I;
 4826: iterate(I, Done, Fun, _) ->
 4827:     iterate(Fun(I), Done, Fun, I).
 4828: 
 4829: 
 4830: 
 4831: flush() ->
 4832:     flush([]).
 4833: 
 4834: flush(Msgs) ->
 4835:     receive
 4836: 	Msg ->
 4837: 	    flush([Msg | Msgs])
 4838:     after 0 ->
 4839: 	    lists:reverse(Msgs)
 4840:     end.
 4841: 
 4842: %%%
 4843: %%% Support for testing large files.
 4844: %%%
 4845: 
 4846: run_large_file_test(Config, Run, Name) ->
 4847:     case {os:type(),os:version()} of
 4848: 	{{win32,nt},_} ->
 4849: 	    do_run_large_file_test(Config, Run, Name);
 4850: 	{{unix,sunos},OsVersion} when OsVersion < {5,5,1} ->
 4851: 	    {skip,"Only supported on Win32, Unix or SunOS >= 5.5.1"};
 4852: 	{{unix,_},_} ->
 4853:             case disc_free(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
 4854:                 error ->
 4855:                     {skip, "Failed to query disk space for priv_dir. "
 4856:                            "Is it on a remote file system?~n"};
 4857:                 N when N >= 5 * (1 bsl 20) ->
 4858:                     ct:pal("Free disk: ~w KByte~n", [N]),
 4859:                     do_run_large_file_test(Config, Run, Name);
 4860:                 N when N < 5 * (1 bsl 20) ->
 4861:                     ct:pal("Free disk: ~w KByte~n", [N]),
 4862:                     {skip,"Less than 5 GByte free"}
 4863:             end;
 4864: 	_ ->
 4865: 	    {skip,"Only supported on Win32, Unix or SunOS >= 5.5.1"}
 4866:     end.
 4867: 
 4868: 
 4869: do_run_large_file_test(Config, Run, Name0) ->
 4870:     Name = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 4871: 			 ?MODULE_STRING ++ Name0),
 4872: 
 4873:     %% We run the test in a peer node in case the OOM killer
 4874:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4875: 
 4876:     erpc:call(Node, application, ensure_all_started, [os_mon]),
 4877: 
 4878:     %% Set up a process that will delete this file.
 4879:     Tester = self(),
 4880:     Deleter = 
 4881:         spawn(
 4882:           fun() ->
 4883:                   Mref = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 4884:                   receive
 4885:                       {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} -> ok;
 4886:                       {Tester,done} -> ok
 4887:                   end,
 4888:                   ?FILE_MODULE:delete(Name)
 4889:           end),
 4890: 
 4891:     %% Run the test case.
 4892:     try
 4893:         Res = erpc:call(Node, fun() -> Run(Name) end),
 4894: 
 4895:         %% Delete file and finish deleter process.
 4896:         Mref = erlang:monitor(process, Deleter),
 4897:         Deleter ! {Tester,done},
 4898:         receive {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} -> ok end,
 4899: 
 4900:         Res
 4901:     after
 4902:         peer:stop(Peer)
 4903:     end.
 4904: 
 4905: disc_free(Path) ->
 4906:     Data = disksup:get_disk_data(),
 4907: 
 4908:     %% What partitions could Data be mounted on?
 4909:     Partitions =
 4910:         [D || {P, _Tot, _Perc}=D <- Data,
 4911:          lists:prefix(filename:nativename(P), filename:nativename(Path))],
 4912: 
 4913:     %% Sorting in descending order places the partition with the most specific
 4914:     %% path first.
 4915:     case lists:sort(fun erlang:'>='/2, Partitions) of
 4916:         [{_,Tot, Perc} | _] -> round(Tot * (1-(Perc/100)));
 4917:         [] -> error
 4918:     end.
 4919: 
 4920: memsize() ->
 4921:     case proplists:get_value(available_memory, memsup:get_system_memory_data()) of
 4922:         undefined ->
 4923:             {Tot,_Used,_}  = memsup:get_memory_data(),
 4924:             Tot;
 4925:         Available ->
 4926:             Available
 4927:     end.
